title: The inside story of how Putin torpedoed Starmer‚Äôs first big foreign policy ‚Äòtough decision‚Äô moment
creator: David Maddox
content: When the government plane took off from Joint Base Andrews just outside Washington on Friday evening, Keir Starmer came down to have some small talk with the travelling pack of journalists handing out packs of M&Ms from the White House signed by Joe Biden. But the smile on his face, easy-going casual look and football banter hid what had proven to be an extremely difficult 48 hours for the prime minister in what had culminated in a diplomatic failure. The lesson of the excursion was perhaps that it is far easier to make ‚Äútough choices‚Äù regarding thousands of Britain‚Äôs pensioners potentially dying in a cold winter than it is to sort out a rabid dictator Vladimir Putin threatening to use nukes. Both Downing Street and the Foreign Office (FCDO) staff at the embassy did their best to play down the significance of the trip. But - despite their denials - this meeting of an outgoing lame-duck US president and the recently elected prime minister was mostly about one major issue: whether to allow Ukraine to use long-range Storm Shadow missiles against targets in Russia. The decision to allow it was supposed to be made but not announced. Instead, it was delayed for further discussions at the United Nations General Assembly in New York. How do we know this to be true? Well, just days before that US secretary of state Antony Blinken and foreign secretary David Lammy held a joint press conference in the Foreign Office and basically said so. They revealed the help Iran was giving to...

Ein Abkommen dazu wurde bei seinem Besuch der fast 3.000 Jahre alten Handelsstadt Samarkand an der Seidenstra√üe unterzeichnet. Es soll den Zuzug von FachkraÃàften insbesondere im Pflege- und Gesundheitsbereich und die RuÃàckfuÃàhrung von Usbeken ohne Bleiberecht in Deutschland erleichtern. Bei letzterem Punkt geht es allerdings nur um rund 200 Personen. Das sind weniger als 0,1 Prozent aller 225.000 ausreisepflichtigen Migranten in Deutschland. Insgesamt leben 13.700 Usbeken in Deutschland. Abkommen mit einzelnen HerkunftslaÃàndern sind ein zentraler Bestandteil der Migrationspolitik der Ampel-Regierung. Um sie auszuhandeln, hat sie mit Joachim Stamp eigens einen Beauftragten eingesetzt. Erst am vergangenen Freitag wurde in Berlin ein Migrationsabkommen mit Kenia unterzeichnet, mit Indien, Georgien, Marokko und Kolumbien gibt es solche Vereinbarungen schon laÃànger. Mit Moldau und Kirgistan sind die Verhandlungen bereits weit fortgeschritten, und auch mit den Philippinen und Ghana laufen GespraÃàche. Die Abkommen basieren immer auf zwei SaÃàulen: Abschiebung von Personen ohne Bleiberecht und Anwerbung von FachkraÃàften fuÃàr den deutschen Arbeitsmarkt. title: Notorious vegan activist Tash Peterson subjected to a chilling threat after her latest deceptive stunt in Perth
content: Notorious vegan activist Tash Peterson subjected to a chilling threat after her latest deceptive stunt in Perth By Padraig Collins For Daily Mail Australia Published: 16:33 BST, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 16:51 BST, 15 September 2024 e-mail 1 View comments A notorious Australian vegan activist has filmed herself listening to horrifying threats made about her on the streets of Perth . Tash Peterson was told by a man who had no idea whom he was talking to that if she went to his friend's farm, she would be made to 'vanish'. In her latest stunt, Peterson and her partner Jack Higgs had dressed up as farmers with signs saying 'Farmers Union against Vegans say NO! to VEGANISM'. She filmed encounters of people coming up to her and expressing their strong opinions about her, unaware that she was the one they were talking about. 'Some guy just came up to me talking about me, obviously not knowing that it's me, thinking I'm actually an animal farmer,' she said. Peterson recorded the man saying: 'She is despicable. She is beyond despicable.' 'I've got mates who are farmers and I tell you what they said, "Come on our property you'll vanish",' the man told Ms Peterson. Oblivious to who he was speaking to, the man then remarked on Peterson's scantily-clad attire and use of fake blood in her stunts. title: Four policemen suspended for foisting a false narcotics case
content: Four police personnel including a police sub-inspector attached to Banashankari police station have been suspended for allegedly foisting false a narcotics case against a few people without following due diligence. The suspended police officials acted on the behest of an informer who wanted to implicate his rivals to settle a personal score and used the police, sources said. The suspended officials are PSI Sridhar Gugri, assistant sub-inspector (ASI) S.K. Raju and constables Satish Bagali and Thimmanna Poojar, all posted at the Banashankari police station. The case was registered on August 9 by the Banashankari police following information from one Rajan, a police informant. In the complaint, ASI Raju claimed that the arrested persons were attempting to sell opium to the public in Kadirenahalli, Banashankari 2nd Stage. The case was registered under the Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances (NDPS) Act, 1985. However, the complainants claimed that the case was falsified and a departmental inquiry was ordered by Lokesh B. Jagalasar, Deputy Commissioner of Police (South). During the probe, it was found that ‚ÄúRajan had personal enmity with those who were arrested and he supplied the police with false information‚Äù, according to a senior officer. The inquiry found that the four officials were carried away with the information provided to them and did not do the groundwork to corroborate the tipoff and are hence placed under suspension for ‚Äúnegligence, indiscipline and not...

Terrifying moment machete duel erupts in street as rival gangs swing wildly at each other
creator: Henry Martin
content: THIS is the terrifying moment a duel between machete-wielding thugs breaks out. Video of the horror incident in Southend, Essex , shows a group of masked men wielding large blades in a confrontation with another man, who is also holding a weapon. Police said an arrest has been made and an investigation is progressing after an assault in Southchurch Road shortly after 12.15am this morning. The force said in a statement that officers were on the scene within ten minutes, and it was established that a group of individuals had been involved in a fight, with "a number of weapons seen". One man suffered injuries and received hospital treatment, though his injuries are not life-threatening or life-changing, cops said. This man, 32, from Coventry , has since been arrested on suspicion of affray. He remains in custody for questioning. Read more News Police said enquiries are ongoing around Southend and they continue to maintain a visible presence in the area. Specialist officers within the Serious Crime Directorate will be leading the investigation and officers will be conducting patrols throughout the coming days, they added. Chief Inspector Paul Hogben said: ‚ÄúI would ask anyone who may have information about this incident, or concerns, to please get in touch with us as soon as possible. ‚ÄúWe take incidents of this nature very seriously and the Southend community can expect a robust response and investigation. title: Human chain formed on International Day of Democracy in Dakshina Kannada and Udupi districts
content: Deputy commissioner K. Vidya Kumari along with officials formed a human chain in Udupi on Sunday.| Photo Credit:UMESH S. SHETTIGAR School and college students formed a human chain at KPT junction in Mangaluru on Sunday.| Photo Credit:H.S. MANJUNATH Gururaj Gantihole, Byndoor MLA, leading the International Day of Democracy celebrations at Maravanthe Beach in Udupi district.| Photo Credit:ANIL KUMAR SASTRY A human chain was formed in parts to mark the International Day of Democracy in Dakshina Kannada and Udupi districts on Sunday, September 15. The chain from Shiroor in Udupi district to Sampaje in Dakshina Kannada via Udupi and Mangaluru cities covering 237 km had breaks in between. The chain in Udupi was from Shrioor to Hejmady Tollgate while in Dakshina Kannada, it was from Hejmady to Sampaje. Though students from government, aided, and private educational institutions took part, it was not a complete chain. Artists performing near Kadri park during the formation of a human chain in Mangaluru on Sunday.| Photo Credit:H.S. MANJUNATH Artists performing near Kadri park during the formation of a human chain in Mangaluru on Sunday.| Photo Credit:H.S. MANJUNATH The district administrations allotted specific locations to education institutes to assemble and form the chain. Principals and teachers too joined students to form the chain. For example, the chain was not complete between KPT Junction and Thumbe. There was a break in between Shiroor and Maravanthe in Udupi district....

Ken Bruce: The BBC is too slow and needs people with vision
creator: The Telegraph
content: Ken Bruce has said the BBC is slow to react and needs ‚Äúpeople with vision‚Äù to get it back on track. , tweeting that while he had intended to fulfil his contract, the BBC had ‚Äúdecided it wants me to leave earlier‚Äù. The 73-year-old has now expressed concern about the broadcaster, : ‚ÄúI do worry for the future of the BBC. ‚ÄúI think it needs to watch where it is going... It‚Äôs a slow organisation to turn around, like a supertanker. It needs people with vision to make sure it goes the right way.‚Äù Bruce hosted his Radio 2 mid-morning show for three decades before joining Greatest Hits Radio, Since joining, Bruce has added 1.6 million listeners to his slot on the commercial station. , though his show continues to be the UK‚Äôs most popular radio programme, with 6.9 million listeners. , which is a 30 per cent increase from the 5.8 million average a year ago. Bruce said: ‚ÄúCommercial radio is really healthy; it is growing.‚Äù ‚ÄúAnd I just think it‚Äôs difficult to reinvent something [the Radio 2 schedule] that has been successful for many years.‚Äù The BBC‚Äôs share of the time people spend listening to radio in the UK Bruce revealed he felt aggrieved at being bumped from his successful mid-morning show to late night obscurity. He said: ‚ÄúI thought, I haven‚Äôt done anything wrong here and it‚Äôs all working. It was a political decision‚Äù Looking at the current state of radio broadcasting, Bruce took issue with He said: ‚ÄúI think some younger people in broadcasting, less experienced people, can say: ‚ÄòThey...

title: Anambra guber: Billionaire businessman prepares to takeover from Soludo
creator: Abdullahim Admin 1
content: An oil magnate, Chief Barth Nwibe, has declared his intention to run for Anambra state governorship election in 2025 on the platform of Labour Party. Nwibe made the declaration when he addressed political stakeholders in Anambra Central Senatorial District in Awka Etiti, Idemili South Local Government Area (LGA) on Sunday. The Igboukwu-born politician and businessman said his desire was to address the leadership failure in the state. Nwibe said the state needed a humble leader who listens to his people and not an all-knowing individual who would not pay attention to the feelings of the masses. ‚ÄúI want to tell you that I am running for Anambra governorship and I want your support, there is a need for us to reorganise our society. ‚ÄúWe need security here, our youths can not live and work here because there are no jobs. ‚ÄúIf my brother, the governor is doing well, I will not have aspired, we expected so much but unfortunately we are seeing so little. ‚ÄúThat is why I am offering myself for a term of four years,‚Äù he said. Nwibe said the statecraft had collapsed due to insecurity, high youth unemployment, collapse of businesses and absence of vision for strategic development. He said Anambra had a rich deposit of natural gas which could be harnessed for industrialisation purposes but regretted that the current administration was not doing anything to activate it. ‚ÄúWe should no longer have a system where the governor determines who should be the traditional ruler, president general,...

title: Death toll rises as torrential rain and flooding force mass evacuations across Central Europe
creator: By KAREL JANICEK - Associated Press
content: PRAGUE (AP) ‚Äî Another night of torrential rains pounding Central Europe forced mass evacuations as the death toll rose on Sunday. Several Central European nations have already been hit by severe flooding, including Austria, the Czech Republic, Poland and Romania , while Slovakia and Hungary might come next, as a result of a low pressure system from northern Italy dumping record rainfall in the region since Thursday. The floods have claimed five lives in Romania, one each in Austria and Poland. In the Czech Republic, four people who were swept away by waters were missing, police said. Most parts of the Czech Republic have been affected as authorities declared the highest flood warnings at around 100 places across the country. But the situation was worst in two northeastern regions that recorded the biggest rainfall in recent days, including the Jeseniky mountains near the Polish border. In the city of Opava, up to 10,000 people out of a population of around 56,000 have been asked to leave their homes for higher ground. Rescuers used boats to transport people to safety in a neighborhood flooded by the raging Opava River. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs no reason to wait,‚Äù Mayor TomaÃÅsÃå NavraÃÅtil told Czech public radio. He said that the situation was worse than during the last devastating floods in 1997, known as the ‚Äúflood of the century.‚Äù ‚ÄúWe have to focus on saving lives,‚Äù Prime Minister Petr Fiala told Czech public television on Sunday. His government was set to meet Monday to assess the...

title: Chhattisgarh policeman among five of family killed over ‚Äòwitchcraft‚Äô in Sukma
content: Five members of a family, including a Chhattisgarh police head constable, were beaten to death allegedly on suspicion of practising witchcraft in a village in Chhattisgarh‚Äôs Sukma district on Sunday (September 15, 2024), police said. According to the police, the victims, including three women, are residents of Etkal village in the Konta area of the Southern district. They were attacked by a bunch of fellow villagers who suspected that their witchcraft was responsible for a few deaths in the village over the past fortnight. So far, five men, also from the same village, have been arrested for the murders but Superintendent of Police (Sukma) Kiran Chavan said there were around 15 people who attacked the victims with batons and other weapons. The police identified the deceased as Mausam Kanna (60), his wife Mausam Biri (age not specified), their son Mausam Buchcha (34), who is a Chhattisgarh police personnel, Mausam Buchcha‚Äôs wife Mausam Arjo (32), and another woman Karka Lachchi (43). Mr. Chavan said that after a couple of children died in the village, the locals consulted their Baiga or the local priest who pointed at the Mausam Buchcha‚Äôs family‚Äôs witchcraft being purportedly responsible. ‚ÄúOn Sunday, a meeting was held which was attended by nearly 25 people. Once the victims, including the head constable in plainclothes reached there, an argument ensued between them and the other villagers, who held them responsible for the deaths. The matter heated up and things soon turned...

title: SERIE A - Atalanta-Fiorentina: 3-2, Lookman sugli scudi. Torino-Lecce termina 0-0
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: L' Atalanta , reduce da due sconfitte consecutive contro Torino e Inter, ritrova finalmente il successo contro la Fiorentina . Nel match delle 15, i bergamaschi hanno trionfato per 3-2 , mentre Palladino continua a inseguire la sua prima vittoria in campionato sulla panchina dei viola. Sono stati peroÃÄ i gigliati a portarsi in vantaggio, grazie alla rete di Martinez Quarta al 15', ma sei minuti piuÃÄ tardi eÃÄ arrivato il pareggio di Mateo Retegui , dopo che Ademola Lookman eÃÄ stato protagonista di una giocata spettacolare impreziosita dall'assist. La Fiorentina si eÃÄ poi riportata avanti al 32' con Moise Kean . Tuttavia, nei minuti di recupero del primo tempo, accade l'inverosimile: Charles De Ketelaere ristabilisce la paritaÃÄ al 45', e subito dopo, al 46', Lookman completa la rimonta, ribaltando incredibilmente il risultato. Nell'altro match delle 15, tra Torino e Lecce , la gara si eÃÄ conclusa sullo 0-0 . I salentini hanno piuÃÄ volte sfiorato il vantaggio, ma Milinkovic-Savic si eÃÄ sempre fatto trovare pronto. I granata, dal canto loro, hanno creato poche occasioni degne di nota.

title: Politano: "Devo essere piuÃÄ preciso. Oggi eÃÄ importante vincere per farne tre di fila"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Napoli in campo alle ore 18.00 per la gara di campionato contro il Cagliari, azzurri di Antonio Conte a caccia del terzo successo consecutivo. Matteo Politano ha parlato ai microfoni di SKY Sport prima dell'inizio del match contro la compagine sarda. " Ho tirato tanto in queste prime tre giornate di campionato ma manca il gol? Bisogna prendere la porta e cercare di far gol. A parte gli scherzi, mi serve piuÃÄ precisione ma oggi saraÃÄ importante far gol, non solo io ma tutti". "Oggi eÃÄ importante vincere per farne tre di fila, eÃÄ tanto che non le facciamo, sappiamo l'importanza di questa partita soprattutto a livello mentale ", ha riferito l'esterno del Napoli che nella giornata di oggi partiraÃÄ da titolare. Il calciatore ex Inter e Sassuolo deve dimostrare di meritare la maglia da titolare del Napoli, alle sue spalle c'eÃÄ David Neres che spinge fortemente, l'esterno brasiliano eÃÄ diventato un collega molto temibile.

title: Conte: "Abbiamo un obiettivo, eÃÄ un grande stimolo. Lukaku deve ancora migliorare"
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Si avvicina il match tra Cagliari e Napoli e Antonio Conte , tecnico della squadra azzurra, ha rilasciato alcune dichiarazioni ai microfoni di Sky Sport prima della partita: "Cosa rappresenta questo incontro? Da piuÃÄ di un anno mezzo non vinciamo tre partite consecutive, quindi potrebbe essere un grande stimolo. Detto questo, sappiamo che questa prima parte di campionato sta vedendo comunque un po' di difficoltaÃÄ da parte di tutte, poicheÃÅ il mercato eÃÄ finito troppo tardi. Ci saraÃÄ un periodo di assestamento per tutti, per il resto bisogneraÃÄ cercare di fare piuÃÄ punti possibili, dato che questa eÃÄ la ricetta migliore per essere sereni". Ha, poi, evidenziato: " Lukaku dal primo minuto ? Romelu eÃÄ arrivato a tre giorni dalla chiusura del mercato, questa eÃÄ la prima opportunitaÃÄ che abbiamo avuto, durante la sosta per le Nazionali, per cercare di metterlo in forma. Sicuramente, ha ancora margini di miglioramento peroÃÄ, al tempo stesso, rappresenta per noi un giocatore importante". Dopo aver trovato il gol al debutto contro il Parma, entrando dalla panchina, il tecnico leccese ha deciso di far partire subito il belga dal primo minuto contro la squadra sarda.

title: Gattuso vince e regala 35 iPhone ai propri giocatori. Ha speso 40mila euro!
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Gennaro Gattuso sta facendo molto bene nel campionato croato alla guida dell'Hajduk Spalato, la sua squadra in sei partite non ha mai perso (quattro vittorie e due pareggi) e in questo momento di trova in testa alla classifica in compagnia del Rijeka (Fiume). Un traguardo che Gattuso, che non eÃÄ nuovo in carriera a comportamenti generosi nei confronti dei suoi giocatori e del suo staff, ha voluto celebrare spendendo circa 40mila euro per regalare a tutti 35 iPhone 16 , l‚Äôultimo modello. Il gesto dell‚Äôex allenatore del Napoli eÃÄ arrivato dopo la vittoria in trasferta (1-0 con gol dell'ex interista Livaja) nella partita piuÃÄ sentita, la sfida contro gli arcirivali della Dinamo Zagabria, ma come detto l‚Äôex centrocampista rossonero non eÃÄ nuovo ad atti di generositaÃÄ. Quando nel 2014 allenava in Grecia, all‚ÄôOfi Creta, dopo le sue dimissioni decise di pagare personalmente gli stipendi ai giocatori (circa 50mila euro), mentre nel 2019, quando disse addio al Milan, rifiutoÃÄ la buona uscita per permettere l‚Äôintero pagamento delle 24 mensilitaÃÄ del suo staff.

title: Conte a DAZN: "I nuovi hanno bisogno di lavorare". Poi le belle parole su Giaccherini
creator: AreaNapoli.it
content: Napoli in campo alle ore 18:00 contro il Cagliari. Antonio Conte , tecnico azzurro, ha parlato anche ai microfoni di DAZN. "I nuovi hanno bisogno di lavorare, lo stesso Lukaku ha sfruttato bene la sosta, eÃÄ stato con noi e abbiamo potuto lavorare con lui. Anche McTominay e Gilmour sono arrivati in una condizione buona, questo mercato chiuso cosiÃÄ tardi sta provocando questa partenza a rallentatore da parte di tutte, tutte piuÃÄ o meno stanno trovando difficoltaÃÄ". " La cosa su cui devono lavorare eÃÄ l'aspetto fisico, Lukaku non giocava da tanto e ha un fisico importante, gli serve tempo per entrare in forma, conosco le sue caratteristiche, da un punto di vista tattico siamo un po' avvantaggiati con lui", ha sottolineato. Poi il simpatico siparietto: " Fa sempre piacere rivedere Giaccherini, ci lega una storia bella e importante, sia nel periodo della Juventus che della nazionale, era un ottimo calciatore e soprattutto un grandissimo ragazzo".

content: Davide Nicola , allenatore del Cagliari , ha parlato ai microfoni di Sky Sport prima della sfida contro il Napoli. title: Army to guard a hospital in Italy after a spate of attacks on medical staff across the country
content: ROME -- The Italian army will start guarding medical staff at a hospital in the southern Calabria region from Monday, after a string of violent attacks on doctors and nurses by enraged patients and relatives across Italy, according to local media reports. Prefect Paolo Giovanni Grieco has approved a plan to reinforce the surveillance services already operated by soldiers on sensitive targets in the Calabrian town of Vibo Valentia, including the hospital, the reports added. Recent attacks on health workers have been particularly frequent in southern Italy, prompting doctors‚Äô national guild to ask for the army to be deployed to ensure medical staff‚Äôs safety. The turning point was an assault at the Policlinico hospital in the southern city of Foggia in early September. A group of about 50 relatives and friends of a 23-year-old woman ‚Äî who died during emergency surgery ‚Äî turned their grief and rage into violence, attacking the hospital staff. Video footage, widely circulated on social media, showed doctors and nurses barricading in a room to escape the attack. Some of them were punched and injured. The director of the hospital threatened to close its emergency room after denouncing three similar attacks in less than a week. With over 16,000 reported cases of physical and verbal assaults in 2023 alone, Italian doctors and nurses have called for drastic measures. ‚ÄúWe have never seen such levels of aggression in the past decade,‚Äù said Antonio De Palma, president of the Nursing Up...

title: Raiders inactives: Three 2024 NFL Draft picks won't dress in Week 2 | Sporting News
creator: Mike Moraitis
content: The Las Vegas Raiders and Baltimore Ravens have released their lists of inactives ahead of the Week 2 game at M&T Bank Stadium. The Raiders have four of their 2024 NFL Draft picks among the list of inactives, with running back Dylan Laube, guard Jackson Powers-Johnson and cornerback Decamerion Richardson all not dressing. All three draft picks were inactive last week, also. Powers-Johnson has been dealing with an illness, while Richardson has a hamstring injury. Laube is a healthy scratch once again. One 2024 draft pick who will be making his debut this week is linebacker Tommy Eichenberg, who sat out last week with a knee injury. Eichenberg should have a role on special teams. Last but not least, defensive end Tyree Wilson is inactive, as expected. The Raiders are extremely thin at EDGE after Malcolm Koonce was placed on injured reserve ahead of Week 1. Now a full look at the inactives for both the Raiders and the Ravens. Raiders inactives DE Tyree Wilson RB Dylan Laube CB Decamerion Richardson WR Tyreik McAllister S Thomas Harper G Jackson Powers-Johnson WR Ramel Keyton Ravens inactives CB Nate Wiggins S Beau Brade CB T.J. Tampa OLB Adisa Isaac C Nick Samac G Sala Aumavae-Laulu WR Devontez Walker

title: Edo Guber 2024: AA Candidate, Okojie, Steps Down, Backs Okpebholo Of APC
creator: Francis Onoiribholo
content: BENIN ‚Äì The gubernatorial candidate of the Action Alliance (AA), in the September 21 governorship election in Edo State, Prince Tom Iseghohi Okojie, has stepped down from the race and pledged his support for the All Progressives Congress (APC) candidate, Monday Okpebholo Briefing journalists in Benin city on Sunday, Iseghohi Okojie said the decision to step down from the governorship race and support for the APC candidate, Monday Okpebholo is to unite with a capable political leader and party that has the sincere intention to develop Edo State. Aligning with the APC and her governorship candidate, Monday Okpebholo, according to Iseghohi Okojie, is the best path to take, describing the APC candidate, Okpebholo, as a man with the capacity to lead, saying, ‚Äúleadership is not about giving wonderful speeches but about mikness and relationship with the people you are leading‚Äù. Iseghohi Okojie, however, promised to mobilize 65,000 people to vote on election day for the APC . Edo State Acting Chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Jarrett Tenebe, while receiving the AA governorship candidate, Iseghohi said the alliance is to form a government of unity. Other top APC chieftains present at the ceremony include Blessing Agbomhere , APC organising Secretary, South South .

title: I had extreme insomnia and barely slept for nine months after my career fell apart. It left me in agony but I finally cured it
content: EXCLUSIVE I had extreme insomnia and barely slept for nine months after my career fell apart. It left me in agony but I finally cured it By Sally Meeson Published: 16:39, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 17:08, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments It's 4am. But rather than being snuggled under my duvet, gently drifting through ¬≠soothing dreams, I'm sitting bolt upright in bed. I've wandered to and from my sofa ¬≠countless times. I've aimlessly opened and closed the fridge, then peered through my French doors to be eyed suspiciously by a fox. I don't blame its annoyance at sharing this ¬≠solitary hour with me. I'm thoroughly annoyed myself. Yet when I return to my dark, shuttered bedroom, collapsing exhausted on to my bed, the one thing I crave refuses to appear. Sleep. My body aches, longs and screams for it. But it has been weeks since I slept ‚Äì and that is no exaggeration. For roughly nine months, in 2022, I barely slept at all. This was no brief period of insomnia, like that ¬≠suffered by one in three of the UK population. It wasn't 'troubled sleep' or the occasional rough night. No, this was full-on, wide-eyed sleeplessness, the kind that could drive a person mad and their life out of control. Sally Meeson developed severe insomnia after the Covid pandemic I've never craved a 'conventional' life. When everyone at school was choosing universities, I decided I wanted to be an actress. When most of my girlfriends were getting ¬≠married and having kids in their 20s, I wanted...

title: US, UK fears Russia may be helping Iran‚Äôs nuclear weapons program: report
creator: Ronny Reyes
content: American and British leaders are growing concerned that Russia may be sharing nuclear secrets with Iran to bolster its weapons program in exchange for ballistic missiles to bomb Ukraine, according to an unsettling new report. President Biden and UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer shared their worries privately during a meeting in Washington on Friday ‚Äî as the two leaders sought to tighten their military cooperation over the alleged deal between the Kremlin and Tehran, sources told The Guardian . While the exact details of the possible exchange remain unclear, intelligence sources believe Russia is providing specialists to help streamline Iran‚Äôs nuclear program as it grows its stockpile of enriched uranium. US Secretary of State Antony Blinken raised the alarm over the alleged deal last week in a trip to London following reports that Iran had been supplying Moscow with ballistic missiles. US and UK officials quickly came to the conclusion that Russia must be making the exchange worthwhile for Iran. ‚ÄúFor its part, Russia is sharing technology that Iran seeks, this is a two-way street, including on nuclear issues as well as some space information,‚Äù Blinken told reporters last Tuesday. Blinken‚Äôs allegations came at a time when Britain, France and Germany filed a joint warning that Tehran‚Äôs stockpile of highly enriched uranium had ‚Äúcontinued to grow significantly, without any credible civilian justification.‚Äù The G7 also united in condemning the arms deal between Iran and Russia on...

title: Steve-O Canceled His D-Cup Breast Implant Surgery To "Get Laughs" For This One Reason
content: Steve-O decided not to move forward with his plan to get breast implants as a joke after all. The Jackass star revealed during an interview with Consequence of Sound why he's ultimately not moving forward with the procedure. "On the day the scheduled surgery was supposed to happen, I was checking out at the supermarket, and the person ringing up my groceries was evidently transgender, and it struck me as a sign from the universe," Steve-O said. "So I asked the transgender person if I could run something by them, and I had a conversation with this person that had a profound impact on me." Back in July, Steve-O shared with X5 Podcast that he had plans to undergo breast augmentation surgery as a joke. "I came up with the idea a few years ago to get a boob job and just film a bunch of legitimately funny hidden camera pranks with me in disguise," he explained, "and then revealing who I actually am." The 50-year-old stunt performer and comedian had booked the breast augmentation appointment and was ready to go. "I spoke with the doctors," he continued, "and I said to them candidly, 'The one thing I'm really freaked out about and bummed out about‚Äîand would back out of this over‚Äîis if I'm just gonna be a mess afterwards.'" "In the spirit of 'gone too far,' getting a boob job‚Äînuclear move," he continued. "I'm just kind of looking at it like a numbers game," he said on the X5 Podcast . Now, Steve-O has revealed that while he spent much time publicizing his intent for the stunt, he...

title: Uniek: Oliver Bearman eerste coureur met punten in eerste races voor twee teams
creator: Sportredactie
content: Oliver Bearman heeft historie geschreven in de Formule 1. De 19-jarige Brit is de eerste coureur ooit die punten weet te pakken voor twee verschillende ploegen in zijn eerste twee races. Bearman werd zondag tiende in de Grote Prijs van Azerbeidzjan. Hij verving in Bakoe bij Haas de geschorste Kevin Magnussen. Eerder dit jaar pakte Bearman namens Ferrari al punten in Saoedi-ArabieÃà. Toen finishte hij als zevende. De Britse tiener is voor 2025 al verzekerd van een stoeltje op de startgrid in de Formule 1. Bij Haas zal hij volgend jaar een duo vormen met Esteban Ocon, nu nog actief voor Alpine. ‚Ä¢ Voor in de agenda: voor het slot van het F1-seizoen Kalender Formule 1 Stand Formule 1 Gratis onbeperkt toegang tot Showbytes? title: En la misma semana, el Papa recibe a la CGT y a Sandra Pettovello
creator: Leandro Rosati
content: El Papa Francisco protagonizaraÃÅ esta semana una serie de encuentros claves y recibiraÃÅ con diferencia de horas a autoridades de la ConfederacioÃÅn General del Trabajo (CGT) y a la ministra de Capital Humano, Sandra Pettovello . A pesar de la tensioÃÅn entre los sindicalistas y el Gobierno, el canal de diaÃÅlogo entre ambas partes es fluido debido a la negociacioÃÅn abierta por los detalles correspondientes a la reforma laboral auÃÅn en definicioÃÅn. De esta forma, Pettovello se cruzaraÃÅ en Roma con dos de los tres triunviros de la central, HeÃÅctor Daer y Pablo Moyano , quienes haraÃÅn entrega al Papa de un documento que expresa su preocupacioÃÅn por las poliÃÅticas econoÃÅmicas de la administracioÃÅn de Javier Milei. TambieÃÅn participaraÃÅn de la reunioÃÅn del lunes a las 9.30 otros dirigentes gremiales como Gerardo MartiÃÅnez (UOCRA), AndreÃÅs RodriÃÅguez (UPCN), JoseÃÅ Luis Lingeri (Obras Sanitarias), Juan Carlos Schmid (Dragado y Balizamiento), Rodolfo Daer (AlimentacioÃÅn), Marina Jaureguiberry (docentes privados), Maia Volcovinsky (judiciales), Argentino Geneiro (gastronoÃÅmicos), y Alejandro Gramajo (UTEP). La funcionaria tambieÃÅn visitaraÃÅ al Sumo PontiÃÅfice, y si bien, desde Capital Humano evitaron precisar la fecha del intercambio, trascendioÃÅ que seriÃÅa entre el lunes y el martes , despueÃÅs de la reunioÃÅn con la CGT. Se trata de la primera reunioÃÅn a solas con la maÃÅxima autoridad eclesiaÃÅstica, luego de haber participado en el intercambio que tuvo lugar el 14 de febrero junto a la...

title: Video: Jerry Jones Gifts Tom Brady a Custom Game Ball Before Cowboys vs. Saints
creator: Timothy Rapp
content: Former NFL quarterback and current Fox Sports color commentator Tom Brady is broadcasting the matchup between the New Orleans Saints and Dallas Cowboys at AT&T Stadium on Sunday. Sappiamo sicuramente che si tratta di una partita sentita dalla tifoseria, prima analizziamo bene questa sconfitta e poi penseremo alla partita con lo Spezia‚Äù.

title: AP News Summary at 11:48 a.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Which candidate is better for tech innovation? Venture capitalists divided on Harris or Trump LOS ANGELES (AP) ‚Äî Being a venture capitalist carries a lot of prestige in Silicon Valley. So when some of the industry‚Äôs biggest names endorsed former President Donald Trump and the onetime VC he picked for a running mate, JD Vance, people took notice. Hundreds of other VCs threw their weight behind Vice President Kamala Harris, drawing battle lines over which presidential candidate will be better for tech innovation and the conditions startups need to thrive. For years, many of Silicon Valley‚Äôs political discussions took place behind closed doors. Now, those casual debates have gone public ‚Äî on podcasts, social media and online manifestos. A missile fired by Yemen's rebels lands in Israel and triggers sirens at international airport JERUSALEM (AP) ‚Äî A missile fired by Yemen‚Äôs Iran-backed rebels has landed in an open area in central Israel and triggered air raid sirens at its international airport. It's the latest reverberation from the nearly yearlong war in Gaza. Israel hinted that it would respond militarily to the missile launch which happened early Sunday. There were no reports of casualties or major damage. But Israeli media aired footage showing people racing to shelters in Ben Gurion International Airport. The Israeli military also said Sunday that there was a ‚Äúhigh probability‚Äù that three hostages found dead months ago were killed in an Israeli airstrike. The army...

title: Eid-el-Maulud: Emulate virtues of Prophet Muhammad, NILDS DG urges Muslims
creator: Taiye Odewale
content: The Director-General (DG) of National Institute for Legislative and Democratic Studies (NILDS), Professor Abubakar Sulaiman, has felicitated with the Muslim Ummah on the occasion of this year‚Äôs Mawlid Nabiy. Professor Sulaiman stated this in a statement signed by his media adviser, Mohammad Abdulkadri, in Abuja on Sunday. He described Prophet Muhammad as a perfect example for humanity who bequeathed legacies of piety, patience, peace and perseverance which underscores the very essence of celebrating his birthday. The NILDS DG in the statement, also described Prophet Muhammad as an embodiment of virtues required by Nigerians and humanity generally, to embrace. He specifically enjoined Nigerians to embrace peaceful co-existence, good neighbourliness, religious tolerance and to promote societal peace towards ending terrorism, banditry and other challenges associated with insecurity bedeviling the country. He emphasised the need to embrace good character of Prophet Muhammad such as generosity, simplicity and humility as guides to all believers towards correcting the ills in the society as well as imbibement of culture of selfless service, patriotism and to shun vices capable of undermining national integrity among comity of Nations. While urging muslims to be good ambassadors of Islam in all their undertakings, the NILDS boss, called on them to pray for the country at all times.

title: Future Focus: Navigating the Challenges Facing Tourism Professionals
content: Sunday, September 15, 2024 The global tourism landscape is undergoing a profound shift as younger generations become the primary travelers. Baby boomers, once the cornerstone of the travel industry, are slowly stepping back from extensive travel due to aging, while millennials and Gen Z are rapidly filling this gap. By 2030, millennials and Gen Z will represent 90% of the travel market. These generations are digital natives who value technology integration in their travel experiences, from booking accommodations to sharing their trips on social media. Moreover, these younger travelers are more conscientious of environmental and societal impacts, showing a clear preference for companies that align with their values. This change is not just about sustainability but also about choosing brands that champion ethical practices, inclusivity, and transparency. To remain competitive, travel operators will need to rethink their services, shifting towards experiences that resonate with the values of these new consumers. Technology is another force dramatically reshaping the tourism industry. Artificial intelligence (AI) and generative AI (GenAI) tools are poised to redefine how travelers plan and experience their journeys. Virtual travel assistants, AI-powered chatbots, and predictive booking systems are already emerging in the market, offering travelers personalized itineraries tailored to their preferences, budgets, and even last-minute changes like cancellations or delays. However,...

title: TECNO Opens Exclusive Centre In Lokoja For Customers‚Äô Easy Access
creator: Justus Adejumoh
content: Innovative technology brand, TECNO, has opened a new centre tagged ‚ÄòTECNO Exclusive New Planet‚Äô in Lokoja, Kogi state capital. The commissioning of the centre which took place recently is aimed at making Lokoja an exclusive business for TECNO brand and make it more visible in Lokoja city. Speaking at the groundbreaking event, the brand‚Äôs Northern Region Exclusive Supervisor covering Abuja, Kaduna and Kano, Kalu Chenedu, the opening of TECNO Exclusive New Planet is to attract more people to the centre for better visibility and access. According to Chinedu, ‚ÄúWe are here to officially open TECNO Exclusive Planet. Our aim is to make Lokoja an exclusive business centre for TECNO to enhance more visible in the city. ‚ÄúThis is the only exclusive centre we have for now, and it is of highest standard in Lokoja. We are targeting more audience in Lokoja for them to know that we have not only a regular shop, but we have an exclusive shop that is of highest standard where all TECNO businesses are together. ‚ÄúWe have so many things in this Planet- phones, storage accessories, cameras, our styles, our designs and the things imbued in our phones that make them more unique than other brands‚Äô phones.‚Äù On his part, David Cletus, TECNO Marketing Manager, Lokoja region, said the brand‚Äôs target is to make every home in the city and Nigeria as a whole have access to TECNO products. ‚ÄúWhat we have commissioned here today is not all, because we are still having more plans to expand and to also, not...

title: Tottenham undone by an Arsenal corner yet again in north London derby
creator: The Telegraph
content: Even so early in the season this felt like a significant test of ‚Äôs candidacy to finally again win the Premier League. In their all-black away kit, they passed with flying colours. Anything else but a victory in the north London derby would have damaged their chances of keeping pace with ‚Äì who they face next Sunday ‚Äì and it had to be achieved without the heart of their midfield. Injury to and suspension for appeared to leave Arsenal vulnerable but it was ‚Äì again ‚Äì frustrating for as they failed to capitalise in the Capital‚Äôs biggest game. The winning goal? A close-range bullet header from Gabriel Magalhaes with Arsenal again profiting from a set-piece ‚Äì it is 23 goals in the league for them since the start of last season, more than any other side ‚Äì and Spurs once more conceding cheaply. The fault lay with some poor defending from who was far too weak, pushed out of the way by Gabriel and the forlornly appealed to referee Jarred Gillett as the ball ended up in the net. Indeed three of Arsenal‚Äôs last four goals against Spurs have come from corners which suggests one team is doing their homework better than the other. It means that Arsenal have now won in their last three visits to the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium which is an appalling record for the home side, raising the pressure on head coach Ange Postecoglou. There were some boos at the end. Spurs will argue that Arsenal defender Jurrien Timber should have been sent off in a feisty first-half, when he first fouled and then...

title: Tottenham: Ange Postecoglou may already be rethinking his aims for the season
creator: Evening Standard
content: went down to a deeply frustrating 1-0 defeat to rivals . Gabriel Magalhaes in the 64th minute after switched off from a corner, to leave ‚Äôs side with just four points from as many games. Here are the key Tottenham talking points... Spurs already off the pace A third consecutive home defeat to Arsenal was all the more frustrating for Spurs because it felt like such an opportunity missed. There is never a good time to play Mikel Arteta‚Äôs Arsenal but the Gunners travelled up the Seven Sisters Road without the suspended Declan Rice and missing six senior players to injury. The absence of Rice and captain Martin Odegaard meant Thomas Partey and Jorginho lined up in midfield ‚Äì hardly the most dynamic pairing at this level. And yet, for all their possession and openings, Spurs failed to take advantage in another frustrating afternoon which followed a now-familiar script. Postecoglou‚Äôs side played some eye-catching football at times and pressed Arsenal superbly, but the hosts were short of cutting edge in front of goal and ultimately undone by a defensive lapse at a set-piece. It was far too easy for Gabriel to head home the winner just after the hour. The upshot is that Spurs now have one win from their opening four matches - coming against pointless Everton - and host Brentford next weekend on the back of consecutive defeats. It is far too early to talk of pressure on Postecoglou, but the Australian said back in April that he expected to be in a title challenge this season, and...

title: Inactives announced in Carolina Panthers-Los Angeles Chargers game. Will Joey Bosa play?
creator: Charlotte Observer
content: The and have made a few key roster decisions ahead of their Week 2 contest. Among those decisions: The Chargers announced that , one of the top pass rushers in the league, will play. Bosa was labeled as ‚Äúquestionable‚Äù heading into Sunday‚Äôs game in Bank of America Stadium with a back injury. This bit of news is a welcomed one for the Chargers, which get one of the most impactful pass rushers in the NFL. It‚Äôs a dreaded one for the Panthers, who will have their hands full staving off Bosa and as second-year quarterback and the Panthers‚Äô offense try to rebound from a moribund Week 1 performance against the Saints. The Jim Harbaugh-led Chargers announced that quarterback , running back , cornerback , safety , offensive lineman , wide receiver and defensive lineman will not play. The Panthers announced their inactive list, too. This list comes as a relief for the Panthers, who had five guys listed as questionable heading into their home-opener, including starting punter (back), starting tight end (back/hamstring) and starting kick returner (personal). Tremble‚Äôs return is particularly compelling; his receiving production and presence as a blocker . Carolina Panthers inactives CB CB Shemar Bartholomew RB Boone C Raym G TE Messiah Swinson Los Angeles Chargers inactives QB Taylor Heinicke (emergency quarterback) RB Kimani Vidal CB Tarheeb Still S Alohi Gilman OL Jordan McFadden WR Brenden Rice DL Justin Eboigbe

Am simtÃßit energia spectatorilor, dar sÃßi sustÃßinerea fosÃßtilor sÃßi actualilor sportivi, faÃÜraÃÜ de care nu asÃß fi putut caÃÇsÃßtiga. VaÃÜ multÃßumesc tuturor, vaÃÜ iubesc!'', a afirmat Bulgaru la primirea trofeului, din partea Simonei Halep. Nice to see so many Romanians stars come out to watch Miriam Bulgaru win her first WTA125 title today at the Tiriac Foundation Trophy. Simona Halep and Nadia ComaÃÜneci participated in the trophy ceremony, and Sorana Cirstea and Horia Tecau were also in attendance for the match. pic.twitter.com/L8Yal3hzlw Fiecare jucaÃÜtoare a dominat caÃÇte un set, dar iÃÇn decisiv a fost echilibru, chiar dacaÃÜ Bulgaru a iÃÇnceput mai bine, cu 2-0. title: Sempre al tuo fianco: le anticipazioni (trama e cast) della prima puntata
creator: Anton Filippo Ferrari
content: Questa sera, domenica 15 settembre 2024, alle ore 21,20 su Rai 1 va in onda la prima puntata di Sempre al tuo fianco, la serie tv diretta da Marco Pontecorvo e Gianluca Mazzella che vuole raccontare come vivono e come affrontano le emergenze gli operatori della Protezione Civile, persone normali in circostanze eccezionali. Ma vediamo insieme tutte le informazioni nel dettaglio. Gli episodi, ispirati a fatti realmente accaduti che hanno visto protagonisti gli uomini e le donne della Protezione Civile, ruotano intorno alla figura di Sara Nobili (Ambra Angiolini), responsabile del Rischio Vulcani a Stromboli. Sara ha fronteggiato alluvioni, cabinovie in panne, emergenze sanitarie e ogni genere di intervento gestito dalla Protezione Civile, scongiurando rischi enormi per il territorio. Una svolta importante nella sua carriera arriva quando viene informata di essere candidata a rivestire il ruolo di Capo delle Emergenze; l‚Äôaltro candidato eÃÄ Renato Lussu (Andrea Bosca), stimato medico e ricercatore con una grande esperienza maturata nelle missioni in Africa, ma soprattutto nuovo compagno di Sara dopo la fine del matrimonio con Massimo (Peppino Mazzotta), padre di sua figlia Marina (Tecla Insolia), ragazza dallo spirito ribelle e in forte conflitto con i genitori per via della separazione. Marina non accetta la nuova relazione della madre con Renato ‚Äì ma la comune sensibilitaÃÄ ambientalista smusseraÃÄ i conflitti ‚Äì neÃÅ vorrebbe seguire la madre a Roma per il nuovo incarico. Abbiamo...

title: Sen. JD Vance addresses Trump's stance on a federal abortion ban: 'I've learned my lesson on speaking for the president'
creator: Yahoo News
content: Sen. JD Vance says he‚Äôs "learned [his] lesson" about speaking on behalf of his running mate, former President Donald Trump, regarding abortion policy. In August, the vice presidential nominee stated that if Trump were elected, he would veto any national abortion ban that crossed his desk. ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre not supporting it as the president of the United States, you fundamentally have to veto it,‚Äù he told host Kristen Welker at the time. ‚Äú[Trump] explicitly said that he would.‚Äù However, during his with Vice President Kamala Harris, Trump clarified that he had never discussed the issue with Vance, saying, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt mind if he has a certain view, but I think he was speaking for me ... but I really didn‚Äôt [say that].‚Äù Vance retracted his earlier remarks in a new interview with Welker on this Sunday, admitting that he and Trump ‚Äústill haven‚Äôt discussed it‚Äù because a national abortion ban ‚Äúis not realistic.‚Äù ‚ÄúI think President Trump has been clear: A national abortion ban is not on the table,‚Äù Vance told Welker in his latest appearance on the Sunday morning news show. ‚ÄúHe wouldn‚Äôt support it. He wouldn‚Äôt sign it. And I think frankly, Kristen, it‚Äôs kind of a ridiculous hypothetical because if a national abortion ban was brought before the United States Senate right now, it would get, at best, 10 senators out of 100.‚Äù Vance explained that Trump ‚Äúwants abortion policy to be made by the states because he thinks, look, Alabama is going to make a different decision from California ‚Äî and that‚Äôs...

ŸàŸÇÿßŸÑ ÿ∏ÿßŸÅÿ±ÿå ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸáÿßŸÖÿ¥ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸàŸîÿ™ŸÖÿ± ÿßŸÑÿµÿ≠ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿµ ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÅŸäŸÑŸÖ: "ÿßŸïŸÜ ÿµŸàŸÅŸäÿß ŸÉÿßŸÜ ÿßŸîŸàŸÑ ÿπŸÖŸÑ ÿ≥ŸäŸÜŸÖÿßŸäŸîŸä ŸÖŸÜ ŸÉÿ™ÿßÿ®ÿ™Ÿä Ÿàÿ∏ŸÑ ÿ≠ÿ®Ÿäÿ≥ ÿßŸÑÿßŸîÿØÿ±ÿßÿ¨ ŸÑŸÖÿØÿ© 12 ÿ≥ŸÜÿ© ŸÑÿßŸîÿ≥ÿ®ÿßÿ® ÿßŸïŸÜÿ™ÿßÿ¨Ÿäÿ©"ÿå ŸàÿßŸîŸÉÿØ ÿÆŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿ´Ÿá ÿ®ÿßŸîŸÜŸá ÿ≠ŸäŸÜŸÖÿß ÿ¥ÿπÿ± ÿ®ÿßŸîŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸàŸÇÿ™ ŸÇÿØ ÿ≠ÿßŸÜ ŸÑÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ÿßŸÑŸÅŸäŸÑŸÖ ÿ®ÿ∏ÿ±ŸàŸÅ ÿßŸïŸÜÿ™ÿßÿ¨Ÿäÿ© ÿ™ŸÑŸäŸÇ ÿ®Ÿá Ÿàÿ™ŸÇÿØŸÖŸá ŸÅŸä ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸàŸâ ÿπÿßŸÑŸä ÿßŸÑÿ¨ŸàÿØÿ©ÿå ŸÇÿ±ÿ± ÿ®ÿØÿ° ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿµŸàŸäÿ± ÿ®Ÿá. ÿ™ŸÅÿßÿµŸäŸÑ ÿßŸìÿÆÿ± ÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ±ÿ® ÿ∏ÿßŸÅÿ± ÿßŸÑÿπÿßÿ®ÿØŸäŸÜ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿØÿ±ÿßŸÖÿß ÿßŸÑŸÖÿµÿ±Ÿäÿ© ŸäŸèÿ∞ŸÉÿ± ÿßŸîŸÜ ÿßŸìÿÆÿ± ŸÖÿ¥ÿßÿ±ŸÉÿ© ŸÑÿ∏ÿßŸÅÿ± ÿßŸÑÿπÿßÿ®ÿØŸäŸÜ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿØÿ±ÿßŸÖÿß ÿßŸÑŸÖÿµÿ±Ÿäÿ© ŸÉÿßŸÜÿ™ ŸÖŸÜ ÿÆŸÑÿßŸÑ ŸÖÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑ "ŸÑŸäÿßŸÑŸä ÿßŸîŸàÿ¨ŸäŸÜŸä"ÿå ÿßŸÑÿ∞Ÿä ÿπŸèÿ±ÿ∂ ŸÅŸä ŸÖŸàÿ≥ŸÖ ÿ±ŸÖÿ∂ÿßŸÜ 2018ÿå Ÿàÿ¥ÿßÿ±ŸÉÿ™ ŸÅŸä ÿ®ÿ∑ŸàŸÑÿ™Ÿá ŸÖÿ¨ŸÖŸàÿπÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ¨ŸàŸÖ ÿ∂ŸÖÿ™: ÿ∏ÿßŸÅÿ± ÿßŸÑÿπÿßÿ®ÿØŸäŸÜÿå ÿßŸîŸÖŸäŸÜÿ© ÿÆŸÑŸäŸÑÿå ÿßŸïŸÜÿ¨Ÿä ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÇÿØŸÖÿå ÿßŸÜÿ™ÿµÿßÿ±ÿå ŸÉÿßÿ±ŸÖŸÜ ÿ®ÿµŸäÿ®ÿµÿå Ÿàÿ∫Ÿäÿ±ŸáŸÖ. title: ÿ∑ÿ±ŸÇ ŸÖŸÅÿ∂ŸÑÿ© ŸÑÿ™ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÅ ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÜŸàŸÖ Ÿàÿ™ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÖŸáÿß
content: ÿπŸÜÿØŸÖÿß ÿ™ŸÉÿ´ÿ± ÿßŸÑÿßŸîÿ∫ÿ±ÿßÿ∂ ÿ∫Ÿäÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÖŸèÿ±ÿ™ÿ®ÿ© ÿØÿßÿÆŸÑ ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÜŸàŸÖÿå Ÿàÿ™ÿπŸÖŸë ÿßŸÑŸÅŸàÿ∂Ÿâ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿßŸîÿÆŸäÿ±ÿ©ÿå Ÿäÿ™ÿ≠ŸàŸëŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∏Ÿáÿ± ÿßŸïŸÑŸâ ÿ≥Ÿäÿ°. ÿßŸïŸÑŸäŸÉÿå ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿ∑Ÿàÿ± ÿßŸÑÿßŸìÿ™Ÿäÿ©ÿå ÿ¥ÿ±ÿ≠ ŸÖŸèŸÅÿµŸëŸÑ ŸÑÿ∑ÿ±ŸÇ ŸÖŸÅÿ∂ŸÑÿ©ÿå ŸàŸÖÿ≥ÿßÿπÿØÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿ™ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÅ ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÜŸàŸÖÿå Ÿàÿ™ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÖŸáÿß. ÿπŸÑŸäŸÉŸê ÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ Ÿáÿ∞Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ∑Ÿàÿßÿ™ÿå ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸîÿ¨ŸÑ ÿßŸîŸÜ ÿ™ÿ∏Ÿáÿ± ÿå ŸÅŸä ÿßŸîŸÅÿ∂ŸÑ ÿµŸàÿ±ÿ©ÿå ÿ®ÿπÿØ ŸÖŸáŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿ¥ÿßŸÖŸÑÿ©. ÿ∑ÿ±ŸäŸÇÿ© ÿßŸÑÿµŸÜÿßÿØŸäŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿßŸîÿ±ÿ®ÿπÿ© ŸÑŸÅÿ±ÿ≤ ÿßŸîÿ∫ÿ±ÿßÿ∂ŸÉ ÿ™ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÅ ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÜŸàŸÖ ÿßŸîÿ≠ÿ∂ÿ±Ÿä 4 ÿµŸÜÿßÿØŸäŸÇ ÿßŸîŸà ÿßŸîŸÉŸäÿßÿ≥ÿå Ÿàÿ∂ÿπŸä ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿßŸîŸàŸÑ ŸÖŸÜŸáÿßÿå ŸÖŸÑÿµŸÇ "ÿßÿ≠ÿ™ŸÅÿ∏Ÿä ÿ®Ÿáÿß"ÿå ŸàÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ´ÿßŸÜŸä "ÿ™ÿ®ÿ±ŸëÿπŸä ÿ®Ÿáÿß"ÿå ŸàÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ´ÿßŸÑÿ´ "ÿÆÿ≤ŸëŸÜŸäŸáÿß"ÿå ŸàÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ±ÿßÿ®ÿπ "ŸÇŸÖÿßŸÖÿ©". Ÿàÿ≤ŸëÿπŸä ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿßŸîŸàŸÑÿå ÿßŸÑÿπŸÜÿßÿµÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ŸÑÿß ÿ™ÿ≤ÿßŸÑŸäŸÜ ÿ®ÿ≠ÿßÿ¨ÿ© ÿßŸïŸÑŸäŸáÿßÿå Ÿàÿ™ŸèÿÆÿ∑Ÿëÿ∑ŸäŸÜ ŸÑÿ™ÿÆÿ≤ŸäŸÜŸáÿß ŸÅŸä ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ™ŸÉ. Ÿàÿ∂ÿπŸä ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ´ÿßŸÜŸäÿå ÿßŸÑÿπŸÜÿßÿµÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ÿ™ÿ™ÿ∑ŸÑÿ® ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ®ÿ±ÿπÿßÿ™. ŸàŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ´ÿßŸÑÿ´ÿå ÿ∂ÿπŸä ÿßŸÑÿπŸÜÿßÿµÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ŸÜŸÇŸÑŸáÿß ÿßŸïŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿÆÿ≤ŸäŸÜ ÿ∑ŸàŸäŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿßŸîŸÖÿØ. ŸàŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ±ÿßÿ®ÿπÿå ÿßŸîŸä ÿµŸÜÿØŸàŸÇ ÿßŸÑŸÇŸÖÿßŸÖÿ©ÿå ÿßÿ±ŸÖŸä ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ±ÿØÿ© ÿßŸîŸà ÿßŸîŸä ÿßŸîÿ∫ÿ±ÿßÿ∂ ŸÖÿ≥ŸàŸîŸàŸÑÿ© ÿπŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÅŸàÿ∂ÿå ŸàÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ÿ™ÿ¥ÿ∫ŸÑ ŸÖÿ≥ÿßÿ≠ÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ™ŸÉ. ŸÖÿ≥ÿ≠ ÿßŸÑÿßŸîÿ≥ÿ∑ÿ≠ ŸÅŸä ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÜŸàŸÖ ŸäŸÇÿ∂Ÿä ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÅ ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿßŸáÿ™ŸÖÿßŸÖ ÿ®ŸÉŸÑŸë ÿßŸÑÿßŸîÿ≥ÿ∑ÿ≠ ŸÅŸä ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ŸÜŸàŸÖŸÉÿå ÿ®ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØÿßŸÖ ŸÅŸàÿ∑ÿ© ŸÖÿµŸÜŸàÿπÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÇŸÖÿßÿ¥ÿå ŸÖÿ®ŸÑŸÑÿ© ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÖÿßÿ°ÿå ŸÖÿπ ÿ∂ÿ±Ÿàÿ±ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ±ŸÉŸäÿ≤ ÿ®ÿ¥ŸÉŸÑ ÿÆÿßÿµ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÄÿÆÿ≤ÿßŸäŸîŸÜÿå ŸàÿßŸÑŸÇÿ∑ÿπ ÿßŸÑŸÅŸÜŸäÿ©ÿå ÿßŸîŸà ÿßŸîŸä ŸÇÿ∑ÿπ ÿ´ÿßÿ®ÿ™ÿ© ÿßŸîÿÆÿ±Ÿâ ŸÅŸä ŸÖÿ≥ÿßÿ≠ÿ© ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÜŸàŸÖ. ŸàŸÑÿß ÿ™ÿ∫ŸÅŸÑŸä ÿπŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÜÿßŸäÿ© ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿ¨ÿØÿ±ÿßŸÜÿå ÿ®ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØÿßŸÖ ŸÖŸÖÿ≥ÿ≠ÿ© ŸÇÿ∑ŸÜŸäÿ©. ÿ´ŸÖŸëÿå ŸÖÿ±ÿ±Ÿä ŸÅŸàÿ∑ÿ© ÿ¨ÿßŸÅÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÉŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÜÿßÿµÿ±. ÿßŸïÿ≤ÿßŸÑÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿ®ÿßÿ± ÿ™ÿ≠ÿ™ÿßÿ¨ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿ™ÿßŸäŸîÿ± ÿßŸîŸäÿ∂Ÿãÿß ÿßŸïŸÑŸâ ÿßŸïÿ≤ÿßŸÑÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿ®ÿßÿ± ÿπŸÜŸáÿßÿå ÿπŸÑŸÖŸãÿß ÿßŸîŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿ®ÿßÿ± Ÿäÿ™ÿ±ÿßŸÉŸÖ ÿßŸîŸäÿ∂Ÿãÿßÿå ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸîÿ∫ÿ∑Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖÿµÿßÿ®Ÿäÿ≠ÿå ŸàŸÖÿ±Ÿàÿ≠ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÇŸÅÿå ŸÖÿß Ÿäÿ≥ÿ™ÿØÿπŸä ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØÿßŸÖ ŸÖŸÜŸÅÿ∂ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿ®ÿßÿ±ÿå ÿßŸîŸà ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÉŸÜÿ≥ÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÉŸáÿ±ÿ®ÿßŸäŸîŸäÿ©ÿå ŸÖÿπ ÿ∂ÿ®ÿ∑Ÿáÿß ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸïÿπÿØÿßÿØ ŸÖŸÜÿÆŸÅÿ∂. ÿ™ÿ¨ÿØÿ± ÿßŸÑÿßŸïÿ¥ÿßÿ±ÿ© ÿßŸïŸÑŸâ ÿßŸîŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿÆŸÑÿµ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿ®ÿßÿ± ŸÅŸä ÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÜŸàŸÖÿå ŸäŸÇÿ∂Ÿä ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸàÿßÿØ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ®ÿ®ÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ≠ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥Ÿäÿ©ÿå ŸàŸäÿ≠ŸÖŸä ÿ¥ÿßÿ∫ŸÑ(ÿ©) ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿ±ŸÅÿ©. ÿ™ŸÜÿ∏ŸäŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿßŸîÿ±ÿ∂Ÿäÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ™ÿÆŸÑŸëÿµ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿ®ÿßÿ± ÿßŸîŸà ÿßŸÑÿßŸîŸàÿ≥ÿßÿÆ ÿ™ÿ±ÿßŸÉŸÖÿ™ ŸÖÿπ ŸÖÿ±Ÿàÿ± ÿßŸÑŸàŸÇÿ™ÿå ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿßŸîÿ±ÿ∂Ÿäÿ©ÿå ÿ®ÿÆÿßÿµÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿßŸîŸÖÿßŸÉŸÜ...

title: JEDAN GOL, DVA CRVENA KARTONA SÃåiroki Brijeg izgubio na gostovanju kod Sloge
content: U sklopu 6. kola WWin lige BiH, Sloga Meridian je ugostila SÃåiroki Brijeg, a krajnji rezultat utakmice bio je 1:0 u korist domacÃÅina. U prvom poluvremenu, Sloga je povela golom VidicÃÅa u 23. minuti. KaracÃÅ je sjajno ubacio loptu s desne strane, a VidicÃÅ je preciznim udarcem svladao TomicÃÅa. SÃåiroki Brijeg pokusÃåao je uzvratiti, ali nisu uspjeli ozbiljnije ugroziti domacÃÅi gol. Kpan je imao priliku u 35. minuti, no njegov udarac otisÃåao je daleko pored gola. Sloga je bila bolja momcÃåad tijekom prvih 45 minuta, a MilicÃÅevicÃÅ je imao priliku povecÃÅati vodstvo, no TomicÃÅ je izvanredno intervenirao. Drugo poluvrijeme donijelo je dodatnu dinamiku. SÃåiroki Brijeg ostao je s igracÃåem manje nakon sÃåto je Filip Taraba iskljucÃåen zbog prekrsÃåaja u 60. minuti. SÃåiroki je bio i rezultatski i igracÃåki u zaostatku, ali i Sloga je dobila crveni karton kada je HalkicÃÅ, nakon pregleda VAR snimke, odlucÃåio iskljucÃåiti i Poparu u 84. minuti zbog drugog ozbiljnog prekrsÃåaja. Tako su obje momcÃåadi do kraja utakmice bile s igracÃåem manje. U 80. minuti, Sloga je prijetila, ali rezultat se nije promijenio. SÃåiroki Brijeg pokusÃåavao je stvoriti prilike, no njihove su sÃåanse bile jalove, dok je tempo igre opao nakon sÃåto su ostali s igracÃåem manje. Sloga je tako zadrzÃåala prednost i ostvarila zasluzÃåenu pobjedu, dok je SÃåiroki Brijeg ostao praznih ruku, pisÃåe SC.

title: Israel CPI jumps to 10-month high of 3.6% in August
creator: Reuters
content: JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Israel's inflation rate surged in August to its highest rate in nearly a year, data from the Central Bureau of Statistics showed on Sunday, reducing the likelihood of more interest rate cuts anytime soon. The annual inflation rate rose to 3.6% last month from 3.2% in July, its highest level since last October. It was well above expectations of 3.2% in a Reuters poll and far exceeds the government's 1-3% annual target range. Government officials have largely blamed war-related supply issues for the spike in inflation. The consumer price index rose by a higher than expected 0.9% in August from July, bolstered by higher costs of fresh produce, food, housing, transport, education and entertainment. These were only partly offset by declines in clothing and footwear, telecoms and furniture. After cutting its benchmark interest rate in January, the Bank of Israel has left the rate unchanged at subsequent meetings in February, April, May, July and August, citing geopolitical tensions, rising price pressures and looser fiscal policy due to Israel's war with the Palestinian militant group Hamas. It next decides on rates on Oct. 9. Israeli central bankers have said they do not expect rate cuts until 2025. (Reporting by Steven Scheer; Editing by Christina Fincher)

title: Formel-1-Liveticker: Verwarnung fuÃàr Verstappen, Geldstrafe fuÃàr McLaren
content: Im Urteil der Rennkommissare hei√üt es, dass Verstappen in der Tat recht habe und es in der Vergangenheit VorfaÃàlle dieser Art gegeben habe, die nicht bestraft wurden. Daher spricht man nur eine Verwarnung aus. Aber: Die Stewards betonen auch, dass es in Zukunft "signifikante Strafen" geben werde, falls es erneut vorkommen sollte, dass man nach der Zieldurchfahrt unter Gelb uÃàberholt. Hier das Urteil im Wortlaut: "The driver overtook other cars after the chequered flag, but while a VSC was still being displayed, following the crash at Turn 2. The driver was reminded that while passing after the chequered flag is not unusual, it is prohibited in the case of yellows, safety car or virtual safety car procedures." "While the drivers were aware of where the incident was, they could not have known if emergency equipment or marshals were being dispatched onto the track, and so have to proceed with caution." "The Stewards are aware that this has happened earlier this season and was not noticed at the time. We are therefore warning the driver concerned, along with all other competitors. Further breaches may incur significant penalties." Das Urteil ist bei allen vier Fahrern identisch. Und auch die letzten Urteile sind da: Verstappen und die anderen Piloten kommen mit einer Verwarnung davon. Mehr gleich bei uns! Das war zu erwarten und ja bereits von uns angekuÃàndigt: McLaren kommt mit einer Geldstrafe davon. 5.000 Euro muss man zahlen, weil sich Teammitglieder bereits vor Rennende auf...

title: England draw T20 series with Australia after washout at Old Trafford
content: England‚Äôs T20 series decider against Australia has been washed out without a ball being bowled after another rainy day at Emirates Old Trafford. The weather ruined last summer‚Äôs crucial Ashes Test between the old rivals, robbing England of the chance to regain the urn, and it was a familiar tale on Sunday after the rivals traded wins in Southampton and Cardiff. The forecast never looked likely to allow for any meaningful play to take place and the umpires finally called the abandonment at 4.20pm ‚Äì almost two hours after the scheduled start. Match abandoned in Manchester due to rain ‚òî The IT20 series is drawn ‚öñ üè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å•Û†ÅÆÛ†ÅßÛ†Åø üá¶üá∫ ‚Äî England Cricket (@englandcricket) England‚Äôs white-ball captain Jos Buttler has missed the entire series with a calf injury and it has now been confirmed he will miss all three ODIs against Australia. That means Harry Brook will captain his country for the first time in the Metro Bank Series. Buttler has not played a competitive match since England lost the T20 World Cup semi-final against India in Guyana at the end of June. Having missed the Hundred, he suffered a setback in his recovery and has also been forced out of facing the Australians. Speedy recovery, Jos üôèGo well captain Brooky üëèODI squad updates üëáüè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å•Û†ÅÆÛ†ÅßÛ†Åø üá¶üá∫ | ‚Äî England Cricket (@englandcricket) Brook has only 15 caps in ODI cricket and said during last year‚Äôs chastening World Cup campaign in India that he was still ‚Äútrying to figure out the format‚Äù. But England already view him as a major voice...

title: Oscar Piastri savours Azerbaijan Grand Prix win after ‚Äòhigh-risk‚Äô overtake
content: The McLaren driver came out on top of a thrilling battle between the pair, launching a move up the inside on lap 20 before spending the remainder of the 51-lap race keeping Leclerc at bay with some remarkable defending. It secured the Australian his second Formula One win and helped move McLaren above Red Bull and into the lead of the constructors‚Äô championship. FULL. SEND. Here's the move that won Oscar Piastri the Azerbaijan Grand Prix üëèüçø #F1 #AzerbaijanGP pic.twitter.com/VUdXIW9lFy ‚Äî Formula 1 (@F1) September 15, 2024 ‚ÄúI think for me it has to be one of the best races I‚Äôve done,‚Äù Piastri said. ‚ÄúIt (the overtake) was a high-risk, high-commitment move but that‚Äôs what I needed to do to try and win the race because I wasn‚Äôt really going to be that keen to finish second. So I had to try. ‚ÄúIf I didn‚Äôt take that opportunity then I was never going to have another one I think. I mean credit to Charles. He was incredibly fair. ‚ÄúI think maybe he thought I was going to sail on into the run-off but I was pleasantly surprised that I actually made the corner. ‚ÄúThe whole 30 laps where I was trying to keep Charles behind was incredibly tough.‚Äù Piastri‚Äôs win capped off a fine day for McLaren as team-mate Lando Norris drove from 15th to fourth, overtaking title rival Max Verstappen in the closing stages. Verstappen‚Äôs Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez was on Piastri and Leclerc‚Äôs tail for the whole race but collided with Ferrari‚Äôs Carlos Sainz on the penultimate lap as both were eliminated....

content: The McLaren driver came out on top of a thrilling battle between the pair, launching a move up the inside on lap 20 before spending the remainder of the 51-lap race keeping Leclerc at bay with some remarkable defending. It secured the Australian his second Formula One win and helped move McLaren above Red Bull and into the lead of the constructors‚Äô championship. FULL. SEND. Here's the move that won Oscar Piastri the Azerbaijan Grand Prix üëèüçø #F1 #AzerbaijanGP pic.twitter.com/VUdXIW9lFy ‚Äî Formula 1 (@F1) September 15, 2024 ‚ÄúI think for me it has to be one of the best races I‚Äôve done,‚Äù Piastri said. ‚ÄúIt (the overtake) was a high-risk, high-commitment move but that‚Äôs what I needed to do to try and win the race because I wasn‚Äôt really going to be that keen to finish second. So I had to try. ‚ÄúIf I didn‚Äôt take that opportunity then I was never going to have another one I think. I mean credit to Charles. He was incredibly fair. ‚ÄúI think maybe he thought I was going to sail on into the run-off but I was pleasantly surprised that I actually made the corner. ‚ÄúThe whole 30 laps where I was trying to keep Charles behind was incredibly tough.‚Äù Piastri‚Äôs win capped off a fine day for McLaren as team-mate Lando Norris drove from 15th to fourth, overtaking title rival Max Verstappen in the closing stages. Brown's status for Monday's game against the visiting Atlanta Falcons as he deals with a new hamstring injury. The 27-year-old made a surprise appearance on Friday's injury report and was a limited participant at each of the last two practices. Sunday is an off day for the Eagles as they rest up for Week 2's Monday Night Football matchup. 'Just got a little tight in practice yesterday,' Eagles coach Nick Sirianni said on Saturday morning. 'We'll see how that goes.' Brown had five catches for 119 yards and a touchdown in Philadelphia's 34-29 victory over the Green Bay Packers on Sept. 6 in Sao Paulo, Brazil. In einer Kita geht es ja nicht nur um Betreuung, sondern auch um fruÃàhkindliche Bildung.‚Äú Auch wuÃàrden Kitas einen wichtigen Beitrag zur Gleichstellung leisten, indem sie es beiden Elternteilen ermoÃàglichen, arbeiten zu gehen. content: Il centrocampista del SuÃàdtirol Tommaso Arrigoni eÃÄ intervenuto nella conferenza stampa dopo la partita contro la Reggiana . ‚ÄúNel calcio contano i punti e oggi abbiamo fatto una grande prestazione di squadra. Siamo contenti, avevamo preparato cosiÃÄ la partita. Siamo riusciti a portarla dalla nostra parte, i risultati nelle ultime settimane non ci davano ragione. Dobbiamo solo continuare come finora. Sappiamo quanto sudore ci stiamo mettendo e vogliamo continuare cosiÃÄ. Non eÃÄ scontato vincere cosiÃÄ qui. Fisicamente sto bene fortunatamente, cerco di dare sempre il massimo di me stesso. Spero di aiutare tanto la squadra percheÃÅ questo eÃÄ il mio compito. Sono un equilibratore, se arrivano i gol tanto meglio. Negli ultimi anni ho sempre giocato in questa posizione, la sento mia. Io penso che l‚Äôobiettivo principale sia consolidare la categoria, niente eÃÄ scontato. Bisogna sempre stare sul pezzo e mai rilassarsi, a salvezza acquisita potremo vedere cosa fare di piuÃÄ.‚Äù

title: NFL 2024 Week 2 early inactives: Jordan Love officially out, Jayden Reed in for Packers
content: Every week we bring you all the inactives from the 1 p.m. ET games in one post, constantly updated with the latest information. There never seemed to be a chance that quarterback Jordan Love would play for the Packers this week, but the team declined to rule him out ahead of Sunday‚Äôs game against the Colts. They did downgrade him to doubtful on Saturday, however, and he is officially out after being placed on the inactive list 90 minutes ahead of kickoff. Malik Willis will start for the Packers and he will have wide receiver Jayden Reed available to catch passes. Reed was listed as questionable due to calf and shin injuries. The Colts will be without wide receiver Josh Downs again this week because of an ankle injury, but defensive tackle DeForest Buckner will play despite a back injury. content: Der Transrapid, die welterste Magnetschwebebahn, ist in Deutschland erfunden, entwickelt und produziert worden. Der HTR hat mittlerweile den kommerziellen Standard erreicht, die Magnetschwebebahn ‚Äûmade in PRC‚Äú ist auf dem besten Weg dahin. Entscheidendste Verbesserung ist der Einsatz von energiesparenden supraleitenden Magneten. So wie der Transrapid, der auf Stelzen durch die Luft schwebt, wird die chinesische Variante moÃàglicherweise nie in Betrieb gehen. title: PSG goalkeeper Donnarumma ruled out of Champions League opener against Girona
creator: The Canadian Press
content: PARIS (AP) ‚Äî Paris Saint-Germain goalkeeper will miss his club's opening match in the Champions League this season because of a muscular problem in his right thigh, the French league club said on Sunday. Donnarumma picked up the injury during on Saturday that extended the club's perfect start in the French league to four matches. PSG said he will be rested for a week. In his absence, could be handed his first start. The 25-year-old Russian goalkeeper joined PSG in June until 2029. PSG host on Wednesday in Europe‚Äôs top club competition. ___ AP soccer: The Associated Press

title: Domenica In: ospiti e scaletta di Mara Venier oggi, 15 settembre 2024
creator: Anton Filippo Ferrari
content: Torna oggi, 15 settembre 2024, Domenica In, la trasmissione della domenica pomeriggio di Rai 1 condotta da Mara Venier. Come da tradizione, si parleraÃÄ di attualitaÃÄ e ci saranno molti ospiti del mondo dello spettacolo e della musica. E non solo. Di seguito, le anticipazioni e gli ospiti della puntata di Domenica In in onda oggi, dalle ore 14, domenica 15 settembre 2024 su Rai 1. La nuova edizione del talk show si presenteraÃÄ al pubblico in una veste del tutto rinnovata: lo studio saraÃÄ completamente nuovo, cosiÃÄ come la grafica, mentre in apertura ci saraÃÄ spazio per un talk show dedicato ai temi di attualitaÃÄ del momento. Stando a quanto si apprende, la prima puntata del 15 settembre dedicheraÃÄ spazio al ricordo di Luca Giurato, il giornalista ‚Äì storico amico del programma e di Mara Venier ‚Äì morto nei giorni scorsi all‚ÄôetaÃÄ di 84 anni dopo un infarto fulminante. Ospite in studio ci saraÃÄ di Renzo Arbore: il conduttore televisivo si racconteraÃÄ in una lunga intervista a 360 gradi, rievocando anche il periodo della sua storia d‚Äôamore con la conduttrice veneta. Ci saraÃÄ anche un nuovo gioco con il pubblico da casa incentrato sulla storia del programma di Rai 1 e in particolar modo sulle edizioni condotte da Venier. Non mancheraÃÄ poi il mondo della musica: tra gli ospiti previsti al debutto spicca il nome di Sal Da Vinci. Il popolare cantautore partenopeo eÃÄ reduce dal successo estivo del suo brano ‚ÄúRossetto e caffeÃÄ‚Äù, che ha scalato le classifiche di vendita nel nostro Paese....

title: Jarni Craenen en Senne Appermont spelen cruciale rol in uitzege Hoeselt op Umitspor
If Arvind Kejriwal steps aside as Delhi CM, who could take over? Here are the top candidates
creator: TOI News Desk
content: NEW DELHI: Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal on Sunday took everyone by surprise when he announced his decision to step down from the top post within 48 hours, igniting widespread speculation about who might fill his shoes. The surprise announcement came just days after his release on bail in connection with the excise policy case. Kejriwal's likely resignation seems to be a strategic move in light of his ongoing legal battles. And yet, he has set the stage for a dramatic return, vowing to reclaim the chief minister‚Äôs office only after being "certified honest" by the people in the upcoming elections. Some familiar names are being seen as his potential replacement: his wife, Sunita Kejriwal , and prominent ministers like Atishi and Gopal Rai. However, Kejriwal‚Äôs refusal to nominate a successor has only fueled more conjecture, leaving many wondering who will lead the AAP as Delhi approaches a critical electoral season. Wife Sunita, Atishi among top contenders With Kejriwal proposing to step aside temporarily, there has been a widespread buzz around the names of his potential successors. One name stands out, who played a pivotal role to keep AAP afloat after Delhi CM‚Äôs arrest, Sunita Kejriwal. A former Indian Revenue Services (IRS) officer, Sunita is no stranger to the politics of the state. She led the party‚Äôs campaign efforts, helping to mobilise AAP‚Äôs base across Delhi, Gujarat, and Haryana. Her administrative experience and proximity to Kejriwal give her a unique edge....

title: Carrarese, Calabro: ‚ÄúAbbiamo subito gol nel nostro momento migliore. Dedica dei tifosi? Non finiroÃÄ mai di ringraziarli‚Äù
creator: Rocco Cristarella
content: L‚Äôallenatore della Carrarese, Antonio Calabro, eÃÄ intervenuto in conferenza stampa al termine della sfida con il Sassuolo . Ecco le sue parole: ‚Äú Peccato aver subito gol proprio nel momento in cui stavamo spingendo di piuÃÄ, quando non riesci a fare gol contro squadre che hanno grandi qualitaÃÄ eÃÄ difficile poi riprendere il controllo del gioco. Ho cercato di inserire punte di gamba nel secondo tempo. Nel complesso avevano anche approcciato bene alla partita‚Äù. ‚Äú Ho provato ad alzare il baricentro per vincere la partita, per questo dopo l‚Äôinfortunio di Giovane ho fatto entrare Panico e non un altro centrocampista. MaturitaÃÄ? Io non parlerei di questo, magari manca quel pizzico di concentrazione in piuÃÄ come successo in occasione del gol di Mulattieri‚Äù. Sulla dedica dei tifosi. ‚ÄúNon finiroÃÄ mai di ringraziare i tifosi, il nostro eÃÄ un rapporto speciale. title: Fiorentina, Palladino: "Oggi la miglior partita da quando sono qui. Sui nuovi..."
content: Ai microfoni di Dazn Raffaele Palladino, allenatore della Fiorentina, ha commentato la sconfitta per 3-2 contro l'Atalanta che lascia i viola a 3 punti in classifica dopo 4 giornate. Queste le sue parole. "L'aspetto mentale non c'entra niente, per 44 minuti abbiamo fatto una grandissima prestazione mettendo in difficoltaÃÄ una squadra come l'Atalanta. Potevamo andare anche sul 3-1, in un minuto e mezzo poi abbiamo preso due gol. Sono contentissimo della prestazione dei ragazzi, prendo tanti spunti positivi da questa partita. Ho fatto i complimenti a tutti, penso sia la miglior partita da quando sono sulla panchina della Fiorentina. Peccato per quei due minuti, c'eÃÄ rammarico. Questa partita ci faraÃÄ crescere". Il tecnico dei viola ha poi commentato la prestazione della difesa. "Il primo gol di Retegui arriva da un calcio d'angolo nostro, abbiamo sbagliato la lettura individuale. L'avevamo studiato, ma abbiamo sbagliato la scelta. Il secondo gol arriva da un calcio piazzato, loro hanno solo due giocatori sotto i 185 centimetri, purtroppo abbiamo pagato questo piccolo gap. Io sono molto contento della fase difensiva di oggi. Abbiamo concesso poco, difeso da squadra. Vanno fatti i complimenti anche se usciamo con una sconfitta. Abbiamo iniziato adesso a lavorare con tutti i ragazzi, ci vuole un po' di tempo. E' compito mio migliorare certi errori che adesso stiamo pagando. Ma i ragazzi saranno applicati negli allenamenti". Infine Palladino ha parlato dei nuovi acquisti. "Quando...

title: EPL: Arsenal ‚Äòtembak‚Äô Spurs untuk kuasai Derbi London
creator: KOSMO!
content: LONDON ‚Äì Jaringan tunggal Gabriel Magalhaes sudah memadai buat Arsenal untuk memastikan kemenangan 1-0 ke atas Tottenham Hotspur di Stadium Tottenham Hotspur, sebentar tadi. Kejayaan kali ini pastinya menghadirkan kelegaan buat pengurus The Gunners, Mikel Arteta yang kehilangan dua tonggak tengah, Martin Odegaard dan Declan Rice. Spurs yang dilihat lebih menguasai permainan wajar menyalahkan diri sendiri kerana gagal menghasilkan penyudah lebih baik memandangkan mereka mampu menghasilkan 15 percubaan berbanding hanya tujuh buat Arsenal. Bagaimanapun, Arsenal terpaksa menanti sehingga minit ke-64, Gabriel bijak menghidu peluang untuk menyambut hantaran Bukayo Saka. Situasi itu pastinya mencetuskan kegusaran buat pengendali Spurs, Ange Postecoglou yang sering dipalit masalah sama musim ini. Keputusan itu mengekalkan rekod tanpa kalah Arsenal setakat ini, berbeza buat Spurs yang kini kecewa buat kali kedua berturut-turut. Kemenangan itu menyaksikan The Gunners daki ke tangga kedua Liga Perdana Inggeris, kini hanya dipisahkan dua mata berbanding Manchester City yang masih kebal tanpa kalah ‚Äì KOSMO! ONLINE

title: Dyche job 'safe' despite winless start to season
content: Everton manager Sean Dyche's job is currently safe despite a wretched start to the season which has left the club winless and bottom of the Premier League. Club sources have told BBC Sport the 53-year-old has credit in the bank from his 20 months in charge, in which he steered them away from relegation. The Toffees were beaten 3-2 at Aston Villa on Saturday and have lost their first four games of a season for the first time in 66 years, but Dyche retains the backing of the club's hierarchy. The former Burnley boss has also entered the final 12 months of his contract at Goodison Park. Everton are in the process of a takeover bid by American businessman John Textor and it remains to be seen whether Dyche's services will be retained should a deal be completed. Saturday's defeat by Villa was the second consecutive match they have lost after being 2-0 ahead. Dyche, who kept Everton up last season despite the club receiving deductions totalling eight points for breaching Premier League financial rules, said after the match: "I didn't come into this season thinking everything was solved because we finished strong last season, absolutely not. "There's massive challenges ahead we need to correct and that's my job and my responsibility." Crystal Palace co-owner Textor has been granted a period of exclusivity as he aims to buy Blues owner Farhad Moshiri's majority stake in the club. Any deal is dependent on the American selling his 45% stake in Palace as Premier League rules prohibit...

Doch das ist in Deutschland gar nicht so einfach, denn nicht alle Begegnungen der NFL werden in der Bundesrepublik im TV und Livestream kostenlos gezeigt. Wer in Deutschland die NFL kostenlos im TV und Livestream verfolgen wollte, wurde bis 2√ü23/24 bei ProSieben, ProSieben Maxx oder im Livestream bei Joyn oder ran fuÃàndig. Au√üerdem bot auch die Streaming-Plattform DAZN einige Spiele und eine Konferenz an. Doch zur NFL-Saison 2023/24 wurde die TV-Landschaft in Bezug auf die NFL in Deutschland auf den Kopf gestellt. ProSieben verlor naÃàmlich alle UÃàbertragungsrechte. Den Platz der Sendergruppe hat RTL eingenommen. Weitere spannende Artikel rund um TV-UÃàbertragungen im Sport: Auf RTL beziehungsweise Nitro sollen laut dem Sender bis zu drei Spiele pro Woche live im Free-TV uÃàbertragen werden. Schon in der Preseason steigt Nitro mit seiner UÃàbertragung ein. Neben dem Angebot im Free-TV laufen die Spiele auch im Livestream auf RTL+ und zusaÃàtzlich noch ein exklusives Spiel bei der Streamingplattform. RTL+ ist allerdings kostenpflichtig. Neben den Angeboten von RTL gibt es in Deutschland auch noch zwei andere...

title: Who is Malik Willis? Meet the Packers backup QB who's starting in place of Jordan Love
creator: FTW Outdoors
content: There will be no this week for the against as Instead, it'll be Malik Willis, who is the backup to the star quarterback and who just joined the team this season. As you watch him start, you may be wondering: who is he? Is he any good? Will he be able to give the Packers the kind of start they need after a Week 1 loss? All good questions. Let's dive in with a look at Willis and who he is as we get set for the game: He was at Auburn in 2017 and 2018, but then he transferred when Bo Nix won the job (before Nix landed at Oregon) and was the QB at Liberty. Although there was some first round buzz ahead of the 2022 NFL Draft, he was a third-round pick for the Tennessee Titans in the hopes Ultimately, he played 11 games total, ran for exactly one touchdown and threw three interceptions in just 66 pass attempts. So, no, They dealt a seventh-round pick in 2025. It's harder to say than you'd think. He was sort of a project when he was drafted and may still take time to develop.

title: Folle scontro alla partita di calcio, giovani aggrediti con catene e bastoni: un ragazzo in ospedale
content: Un grave episodio di violenza si eÃÄ verificato a margine di una partita di calcio di prima categoria. Poco dopo le 16 al campo sportivo di San Pancrazio un gruppo di presunti sostenitori del Bagnacavallo Calcio hanno aggredito alcuni tifosi della squadra locale con sassi, catene e bastoni. Gli scontri sono stati molto violenti e a farne le spese sono stati alcuni giovani di San Pancrazio che sono stati quindi soccorsi dal 118, giunto sul posto con automedica e due ambulanze. Ferite gravi per un ragazzo che eÃÄ stato trasportato con codice di media gravitaÃÄ all'ospedale Santa Maria delle Croci di Ravenna. Nell'area sono accorse anche le forze dell'ordine con volanti della Polizia di Stato, dei Carabinieri e della Guardia di Finanza. Leggi le notizie di RavennaToday su WhatsApp: iscriviti al canale

title: Merlier sprintet zum EM-Titel
content: Auf heimischem Boden hat Sprinter Tim Merlier zum ersten Mal fuÃàr Belgien Gold bei den Rad-Europameisterschaften der MaÃànner geholt. Der viermalige Giro-d'Italia-Etappensieger holte sich auf dem Rundkurs uÃàber 222,9 Kilometer von Heusden-Zolder nach Hasselt den Sieg nach einem Massensprint. Der 31-JaÃàhrige rollte vor dem NiederlaÃànder Olav Kooij und dem estnischen Profi Madis Mihkels uÃàber die Ziellinie. Sein favorisierter Kollege Jasper Philipsen und der niederlaÃàndische Weltmeister Mathieu van der Poel hatten das Nachsehen. Die beiden deutschen Klassiker-Spezialisten Nils Politt und John Degenkolb spielten bei der Medaillenvergabe keine Rolle. Van der Poel wollte sich mit einem Erfolg auf die WM in ZuÃàrich in zwei Wochen vorbereiten. Der 29-JaÃàhrige praÃàsentierte sich wie bei seinen gro√üen Siegen im FruÃàhjahr zwar in starker Form und sorgte bereits gut 90 Kilometer vor dem Ziel fuÃàr die ersten Attacken. Doch das Feld zog sich wieder zusammen und so hatte van der Poel im Duell mit den schnellen Profis keine Chance im Massensprint. Viele Stars nicht dabei Allerdings waren die groÃà√üten Konkurrenten von van der Poel nicht am Start. Tour-Champion Tadej Pogacar ist gerade erst in Kanada wieder ins Renngeschehen eingestiegen. Auch Doppel-Olympiasieger Remco Evenepoel fehlte genauso wie sein verletzter belgischer Landsmann Wout van Aert.
