title: Royals' Prince Harry 40th birthday posts 'show no signs of defrosting relationship'
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Tim Hanlon)
content: Prince Harry was given a 40th birthday message by the Royal Family but there is no sign of a ‚Äúdefrosting‚Äù of their relationship, said an expert. The Duke of Sussex has had a difficult relationship with other royals since moving to the United States and been critical of his family in interviews with American media as well as in his memoir Spare and a Netflix documentary. But the Royal Family shared a post on X saying: ‚ÄúWishing The Duke of Sussex a very happy 40th birthday today!‚Äù. The message was also complete with a picture of a smiling Harry and an emoji of a birthday cake. It is the first time the Royal Family has shared a public message for Harry since wishing him a happy birthday in 2021. And Kensington Palace also posted a message stating:"Wishing a Happy 40th Birthday to The Duke of Sussex!‚Äù Only working royals usually get birthday wishes on the official Royal Family social media accounts. But while the messages would appear to be a positive step, royal expert Tom Bower doesn‚Äôt believe too much should be read into them. He told the Mail : ‚ÄúWilliam and Kate's surprise birthday wishes to Harry do not signal a step towards reconciliation. Rather it shows that the Waleses don't want to be criticised as churlish. Being diplomatic costs them nothing and avoids criticism. The King understandably has congratulated his son but there's no evidence of defrosting their relationship.‚Äù To back up his point, Mr Bower said that Harry went to the funeral of his uncle Robert Fellowes a...

title: Reliance Retail to transfer most of its FMCG brands to RCPL to scale up the business
content: Reliance Retail will transfer most of the fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) brands it owns such as Campa and some of the popular private labels to the recently set up FMCG entity Reliance Consumer Products Ltd (RCPL) to rapidly scale up the business with a dedicated focus, said two industry executives. The list includes private brands such as Snactac, Puric, Glimmer, Enzo and Get Real. RCPL has also decided to set up four-five exclusive bottling plants for Campa, for which it will buy the bottling equipment and give it on lease to the partner who will own and run the operations. It is currently in talks to freeze these deals, according to the executives. The plans to scale up Campa bottling and transfer of FMCG brands comes on the back of Reliance Retail Ventures preparing for a capital infusion of up to Rs 3,900 crore into RCPL through a mix of equity and debt, as ET reported recently. RCPL recently took board approval for this. When completed, it would be Reliance Retail‚Äôs highest capital infusion into the FMCG entity since its inception in November 2022. Reliance Retail Ventures, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Reliance Industries , is the holding company for all the retail businesses of the conglomerate including RCPL. title: Donald Trump su Truth, "odio Taylor Swift"
content: AGI - Donald Trump odia Taylor Swift. E ci tiene a farlo sapere scrivendolo, a caratteri cubitali, in un post sul suo social network 'Truth'. "Odio Taylor Swift" scrive l'ex presidente e candidato repubblicano nelle elezioni di novembre pochi giorni dopo che la popolarissima cantautrice statunitense ha dato il suo endorsement alla vicepresidente e candidata democratica Kamala Harris. Nelle settimane precedenti si era fatto un gran parlare dei fake diffusi dalla campagna di Trump in cui si attribuiva a Taylor Swift l'endorsement all'imprenditore, ma il primo accenno del leader repubblicano alla cantautrice risale al febbraio scorso quando si disse sicuro che "in alcun modo la giovane artista avrebbe potuto sostenere "il corrotto Joe Biden" ed "essere sleale nei confronti dell'uomo che le ha fatto guadagnare cosiÃÄ tanti soldi". Il riferimento di Trump, anche quello fatto su Truth, era ovviamente a se stesso, dal momento che si eÃÄ definito "responsabile" del Music Modernization Act. La legislazione del 2018 ha costituito una radicale riforma della legge sul copyright, aggiornando le regole sulle royalty e sulle licenze per aiutare i musicisti nell'era dello streaming. Ci sono voluti anni per elaborarla ed e' stata approvata all'unanimita' dalla Camera e dal Senato. "Joe Biden non ha fatto nulla per Taylor e non lo fara' mai", scrisse Trump quando ancora il presidente era in corsa per un nuovo mandato. Ma Dina LaPolt, uno degli avvocati dietro l'MMA, ha sostenuto che nemmeno...

title: Poll Finds Taylor Swift‚Äôs Harris Endorsement Had Minimal Impact On Voters‚ÄîAs Trump Says ‚ÄòI Hate‚Äô Swift
creator: Molly Bohannon, Forbes Staff
content: Topline Taylor Swift‚Äôs endorsement of Vice President Kamala Harris last week made little impact on voters, according to an ABC News and Ipsos poll that found only 6% of respondents were more likely to vote for Harris, outpaced by voters who were less likely to back Harris due to Swift‚Äôs nod or didn‚Äôt care either way‚Äîas former President Donald Trump lashes out against Swift on social media. More than 80% of respondents said Swift‚Äôs endorsement made no difference, and 13% were less likely ... [+] to back Harris‚Äîthough ABC News said most who responded negatively were Trump supporters. Key Facts Swift‚Äôs endorsement drove hundreds of thousands of people to a federal voter registration site, but the poll ‚Äîwhich was released Sunday morning and was the first major poll to get at Swift‚Äôs impact‚Äîfound 81% of respondents said the endorsement made no difference in their likelihood of voting for Harris. In addition to the 6% who said it made them more likely to vote Harris, 13% said it made them less likely to‚Äîthough ABC News noted that those who responded negatively to the question were ‚Äúoverwhelmingly Trump supporters‚Äù (Forbes has reached out to ABC News and Ipsos for more data). But the poll found Swift‚Äôs endorsement didn‚Äôt even help Harris much in the expected key demographic: Just 8% of women under 30 said they were more likely to support Harris, 13% said they were less likely and 78% said it made no difference. The poll had 3,276 adult respondents, was conducted online from Sept....

title: Apple Watch SE might go plastic next year, but is that worth the tradeoff?
creator: 9to5mac
content: Earlier this summer, started to emerge that Apple is testing a new ‚Äúrigid plastic‚Äù body for the next generation . It was initially expected at last week‚Äôs Apple event, but unexpectedly got delayed. While a plastic casing would undoubtedly reduce costs, it begs the question ‚Äì will this tradeoff be worth it for customers? The history of Apple Watch SE Apple the in 2020, alongside the . It started at $279, with the same display, aluminum casing, and ceramic back as the . It did lack miss out an Always-On Display, used an older processor, and also lacked support for reading your electrocardiogram (ECG). However, with the starting at $399, it was still a pretty good deal, especially compared to the that Apple still sold for $199. In 2022, Apple refreshed the , and it started at $249 ‚Äì making it a little bit cheaper than the prior model. With this model, Apple updated it to use the same chipset as the flagship , but also changed from a ceramic backing to a new ‚Äúnylon composite‚Äù material, otherwise known as plastic. It still didn‚Äôt add support for reading your ECG, nor did they add an Always-On Display, but it was a solid refresh that made the Apple Watch more accessible to more people. Apple Watch SE 3: What‚Äôs new? In a more recent , Mark Gurman reaffirmed the switch, stating that a shift to rigid plastic is ‚Äúincreasingly likely.‚Äù Gurman also adds that it ‚Äúcould allow for a better array of colors‚Äù, making it more kid friendly. Although we didn‚Äôt see the new at Apple‚Äôs September...

content: Women who were key to exposing the disgraced Hollywood film producer Harvey Weinstein have told of their frustration at the decision by UK prosecutors to discontinue two indecent assault charges against him. The CPS announced this month that it was against a woman in London in 1996 after a review of evidence found ‚Äúthere is no longer a realistic prospect of conviction‚Äù. Perkins, who said she had asked the police to return pieces of evidence including diaries and tapes relating Weinstein, said she believed the UK developments were partly influenced by recent events in the US, where by a New York appeals court. He is due to be retried and now also there. ‚ÄúWhat happened in the US is not about his guilt,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúThere was a legal technicality and all that does is highlight, yet again, that this is about the disparity of power. title: Warga Desa Tanjung Buka SP2 Dibuat Kaget, Gempa Bumi Kekuatan 5.6 Magnitudo Hantam Tenggara Berau
content: ‚Äì Warga Desa Tanjung Buka SP2 dibuat kaget, gempa bumi kekuatan 5.6 magnitudo hantam Tenggara Berau, Minggu (15/9/2024) malam. Berdasarkan rilis dari Badan Meteorologi Klimatologi dan Geofisika (BMKG), gempa terkini berasal dari 145 Kilometer (km) tenggara , Provinsi Kaltim dengan kekuatan 5.6 Magnitudo dan titik koordinat 1.28 LU, 118.42 BT dan kedalaman 10 km. Jangkauan guncangan gempa terasa hingga dibeberapa wilayah hingga Kalimantan Utara (Kaltara) Tanjung Selor, Tarakan dan Bulungan. Untuk penyebat gempa, hingga berita ini dirilis BMKG masih melakukan analisis. Gempa dengan kekuatan 5.6 magnitudo yang sempat mengguncang Kabupaten Berau Kalimantan Timur ( Kaltim ) beberapa menit lalu terasa hingga di daerah Desa Tanjung Buka SP2, Kecamatan Tanjung Palas Tengah, Kabupaten Bulungan. Salah satu warga Desa Tanjung Buka SP2, Sumarmi (55) menyampaikan bahwa gempa yang sempat terasa kurang lebih 5 hingga 7 detik tersebut sempat membuatnya kaget. ‚ÄúIya terasa sampai Desa Tanjung Buka SP2, tidak tau itu gempannya darimana pusatnya,‚Äù kata Sumarmi kepada TribunKaltara.com, Minggu (15/9/2024) Sumarmi menceritakan saat gempa berlangsung, Ia sedang bersama anaknya rebahan diruang tamu rumah sambil menunggu pembeli mengunjungi warungnya. ‚ÄúPas kebetulan ada orang beli, kami kira getaran orang jalan karena rumah kami panggung. Kok goyangannya lumayan, ternyata gempa,‚Äù jelasnya. ‚ÄúIni lebih terasa gempannya dibanding gempa beberapa waktu lalu. Tadi sampai goyang semua lemari etalase dan...

Proposals for a new regulator were brought forward by Sir Keir Starmer‚Äôs new Labour Government in the King‚Äôs Speech and there is concern at Uefa as to the scope of its powers. A letter to Lisa Nandy, the culture secretary, said there should be ‚Äúno government interference in the running of football‚Äù but Telegraph Sport understands Uefa broadly supports the idea of a regulator and that the only contention is its scope. The threat of Premier League clubs being expelled from European competition or England‚Äôs participation at Euro 2028 has been played down by government sources and counterparts at Uefa, with a source saying the letter from the government about plans for a regulator were largely positive. Theodore Theodoridis, Uefa‚Äôs general secretary, has warned that the ‚Äúultimate sanction would be excluding the federation from Uefa and teams from competition‚Äù. It is understood that Nandy has not yet replied to Theodoridis‚Äôs letter but it is expected the Department for Culture, Media and Sport will respond and confirm that Uefa has not previously expressed concerns over a regulator and that the dialogue between all parties has been positive. title: Aleja a tus hijos de la pirotecnia
creator: Agencia Reforma
content: Monterrey.-El uso de pirotecnia en estas fiestas patrias incrementa el riesgo de accidentes graves como quemaduras e incluso amputaciones, sobre todo en menores entre los 10 a los 14 anÃÉos, alerta la FundacioÃÅn Mexicana para la DermatologiÃÅa (FMD). ¬´Durante esta eÃÅpoca, que debe ser de celebracioÃÅn y alegriÃÅa, lamentablemente tambieÃÅn ocurren accidentes por el uso incorrecto de pirotecnia y las lesiones pueden dejar marcas y cicatrices permanentes que afectan considerablemente la calidad de vida e incluso la autoestima de las personas que las sufren¬ª, advirtioÃÅ Susana Canalizo, presidenta de esta asociacioÃÅn civil. La doctora resaltoÃÅ que 6 de cada 10 lesionados con quemaduras son menores de edad, quienes no deberiÃÅan hacer uso de ese tipo de productos, pues no deben ser vistos como juguetes. ¬´Las lesiones maÃÅs graves por quemaduras son de segundo y tercer grado; la explosioÃÅn del artefacto puede causar incluso amputaciones y peÃÅrdida de movilidad debido al danÃÉo del tejido comprometido¬ª, advirtioÃÅ la especialista. ¬´Los accidentes con poÃÅlvora utilizada en la pirotecnia representan un 17 por ciento de la incidencia en quemaduras por fuego directo y 11 por ciento de las quemaduras en general¬ª. La doctora Rossana Llergo Valdez, consejera de la FundacioÃÅn, senÃÉaloÃÅ que durante estas festividades se incrementan las consultas de emergencia, por lo que ante alguÃÅn accidente debemos actuar raÃÅpidamente y alejar de la fuente de calor o fuego a la persona afectada. Enseguida,...

ŒìŒπŒ±œÑŒπÃÅ Œ±œÄŒøÃÅ œÑŒ∑ œÉœÖŒºŒºŒµœÑŒøœáŒ∑ÃÅ œÑœâŒΩ œÄŒøŒªŒπœÑœâÃÅŒΩ, Œ±ŒªŒªŒ±ÃÅ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÑŒø Œ±œÄŒøœÑŒµÃÅŒªŒµœÉŒºŒ±, Œ∏Œ± Œ∫œÅŒπŒ∏ŒµŒπÃÅ œÑŒø ŒµŒ±ÃÅŒΩ Œ∑ Œ¥Œ∑ŒºŒøŒ∫œÅŒ±œÑŒπŒ∫Œ∑ÃÅ œÄŒ±œÅŒ±ÃÅœÑŒ±ŒæŒ∑ Œ∏Œ± Œ≥ŒπÃÅŒΩŒµŒπ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÄŒ±ÃÅŒªŒπ œÄœÅœâœÑŒ±Œ≥œâŒΩŒπÃÅœÉœÑœÅŒπŒ±.Œ§Œø ŒµŒ±ÃÅŒΩ Œ∏Œ± Œ∫ŒµœÅŒ¥ŒπÃÅœÉŒøœÖŒºŒµ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÄŒ±ÃÅŒªŒπ œÑŒ∑ŒΩ . ŒìŒπŒ± ŒΩŒ± ŒºœÄŒøœÅŒµŒπ œÑŒø ŒΩŒ± ŒµŒ≥Œ≥œÖŒ∑Œ∏ŒµŒπÃÅ ŒæŒ±ŒΩŒ±ÃÅ ŒøÃÅœÑŒπ Œ∫Œ±ŒΩŒµŒπÃÅœÇ Œ¥ŒµŒΩ Œ∏Œ± ŒºŒµŒπÃÅŒΩŒµŒπ œÄŒπÃÅœÉœâ¬ª, Œ±ŒΩŒµÃÅœÜŒµœÅŒµ Œø , œÉœÑŒ∑ŒΩ ŒøŒºŒπŒªŒπÃÅŒ± œÑŒøœÖ œÉœÑŒ∑ œÑŒøœÖ ŒïœÄŒµÃÅŒ∫œÅŒπŒΩŒµ œÑŒ∑ Œ∫Œ±Œπ œÑŒøŒΩ œÄœâœÇ ŒµœÄŒπœáŒµŒπœÅŒøœÖÃÅŒΩ ŒΩŒ± Œ¥Œ∑ŒºŒπŒøœÖœÅŒ≥Œ∑ÃÅœÉŒøœÖŒΩ ŒºŒπŒ± Œ∫ŒøŒπŒΩœâŒΩŒπÃÅŒ± œáŒ±ŒºŒ∑ŒªœâÃÅŒΩ œÄœÅŒøœÉŒ¥ŒøŒ∫ŒπœâÃÅŒΩ Œ∫Œ±Œπ ŒøÃÅœÑŒπ ¬´ŒøÃÅœÉŒø Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ±ŒΩ ŒºŒµŒ≥Œ±ÃÅŒªŒ± œÉœÖŒºœÜŒµÃÅœÅŒøŒΩœÑŒ± œÑŒøœÖœÇ œÉœÑŒ∑œÅŒπÃÅŒ∂ŒøœÖŒΩ, Œø Œ∫œÖÃÅŒ∫ŒªŒøœÇ œÑŒ∑œÇ œÜŒ∏ŒøœÅŒ±ÃÅœÇ œÑŒøœÖœÇ, ŒæŒµŒ∫ŒπÃÅŒΩŒ∑œÉŒµ. title: La frontera de Ceuta, cerrada de forma intermitente por el acercamiento de cientos de migrantes
creator: Agencias
content: La DelegacioÃÅn del Gobierno en Ceuta ha confirmado este domingo el "cierre intermitente" de la frontera del Tarajal ante el acercamiento de cientos de personas migrantes al periÃÅmetro fronterizo en Marruecos. La decisioÃÅn ha sido tomada en colaboracioÃÅn "absoluta" entre los gobiernos espanÃÉol y el marroquiÃÅ, que desde hace diÃÅas colaboran para contener la migracioÃÅn irregular. La DelegacioÃÅn, que desconoce actualmente el nuÃÅmero exacto de personas que trata de acceder a la ciudad, cree que el cierre y la apertura de la frontera continuaraÃÅ durante toda la jornada, hasta que los grupos de migrantes subsaharianos y magrebiÃÅes abandonen las inmediaciones de la frontera. Las Fuerzas y Cuerpos de Seguridad se encuentran desde el primer cierre, sobre las 11:00 horas, trabajando en el periÃÅmetro fronterizo para evitar que se produzcan entradas en Ceuta. La Guardia Civil ha desplegado un dispositivo especial despueÃÅs de que se activara una alarma ante la difusioÃÅn de viÃÅdeos en redes sociales que incitaban a organizar una entrada masiva en la ciudad autoÃÅnoma este domingo. La BenemeÃÅrita cuenta con el apoyo extra de una patrullera de altura, un helicoÃÅptero y un elevado nuÃÅmero de agentes del Grupo de Reserva y Seguridad (GRS). Aunque la madrugada de este domingo ha sido tranquila en el lado espanÃÉol, en la localidad de Castillejos se han producido intentos de entrada y arrestos. title: Sempre al tuo fianco: quante puntate, durata e quando finisce
creator: Anton Filippo Ferrari
content: Quante puntate sono previste per Sempre al tuo fianco, la serie tv sulla Protezione Civile in onda su Rai 1? In tutto andranno in onda sei puntate da due episodi ciascuna (totale: 12 episodi). La prima saraÃÄ trasmessa domenica 15 settembre 2024; la sesta e ultima domenica 20 ottobre 2024. Di seguito la programmazione completa (attenzione: potrebbe variare): Ma quanto dura (durata) ogni puntata di Sempre al tuo fianco? La messa in onda di ogni puntata eÃÄ in programma dalle ore 21,30 alle ore 23,25. La durata complessiva saraÃÄ quindi di circa 2 ore. Abbiamo visto quante puntate sono previste per Sempre al tuo fianco, ma dove vederle in diretta tv e live streaming? La serie tv, come detto, va in onda la domenica sera alle ore 21,30 su Rai 1. Non solo tv. SaraÃÄ possibile seguirla anche in live streaming tramite la piattaforma gratuita RaiPlay .it.
